Reviews.Title: “Labor Day 2012”
Reviews.Author: kimbah
Reviews.Content: My husband and I along with our son and his 2 best friends from Full Sail University came down for 3 days and had a blast! Saturday we attended the pool party, sang a few songs, hula hooped and made a few more friends! The staff are the best we have ever met and we travel often. This is our second year at this hotel and the pool party is what brought us back again this year along with 2 more! Our rooms were ocean front, very clean and very comfortable beds. They all come equiped with a small fridg, microwave, safe, etc. The breakfast every day was great, eggs, biscuits and gravy, french toast sticks, waffles, bagels, toast, pastries, cereal, fresh fruit salad, fresh fruit, yogart, 3 juices and 3 coffees. The staff is there re-filling everything often, you just can't go hungry! The Ocean is just steps from the outdoor pool, which is right out the back door next to the breakfast area. Warm cookies at night are to die for! Beach towels at the front desk. I agree with Ed J as they to make you feel like it is a family reunion! The beach is clean and the water was warm. Ice cream truck runs up and down the beach several times a day and you can also rent paddle boards, chairs and umbrellas from the truck set up just steps from the back stairs of the hotel. What are you waiting for make your plans for Daytona Beach and make sure your reservations are with Hampton Inn Daytona Shores - Oceanfront! I know we will be back a 3rd time!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Ed J
Reviews.Content: We were totally impressed with the genuine hospitality of the staff especially the Geneal Manager Sandy. They had a fantastic pool barbecue for the guests and Sandy was comfortably mingling with guests and even sang a few tunes during the Karaoke. This made it feel like a family reunion atmosphere. Our room was oceanfront with a balcony which we truly enjoy. The rooms were very clean. The extra amenties, free breakfast, cookies, free wifi and even beach toys for the children. We found two great restaurants within miles of the hotel one across the street. This hotel definitely will be our hotel of choice when returning to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Back for more”
Reviews.Author: Stuffer L
Reviews.Content: We are currently at Hampton inn Daytona beach shores. This is our third trip here this year and the staff never disappoints us. My husband loves their biscuits and gravy but it was just served on Friday so they are going to surprise him and fix some a small amount on Sunday for him. Where else can you get this kind of hospitality? This is our favorite place to relax. Anyone that writes a bad review just didn't take the time to let the staff make it right. Many thanks to all that put in the extra effort to make us feel at home. This Hampton inn is the best!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel on the beach”
Reviews.Author: JustAnotherTraveler1
Reviews.Content: Friendly service. Clean hotel. Standard Hampton Inn breakfast with fresh waffles, eggs and bacon or sausage, along with cereals and muffins. Also hot cookies each evening. We had a side room, but still had balcony and a good ocean view from the balcony. Saturday BBQ with DJ and karaoke, along with prizes for various drawings and contests. Wish there had been a vegan option for the BBQ, but do not hold against them because there was not, as there are probably only a few like me who would opt for it. But it would be nice to have that added. We will be back. Were there for Labor Day weekend getaway, and thoroughly enjoyed the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend get-away”
Reviews.Author: Kim G
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd trip to Hampton Inn Daytona Shores. We love the extra amenities like the hot breakfast in the mornings and cookies at night. Fantastic spot right on the beach, comfortable rooms, and fun BBQ on Saturdays. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Kelley W
Reviews.Content: For the last 4 years, this has been our family destination hotel! The rooms have always been clean, the staff very attentive, the Saturday BBQ - can't beat it! AND right on the beach. The only thing I can find wrong with this hotel, is I can't stay more often.

Reviews.Title: “Great girls weekend”
Reviews.Author: samsoncat
Reviews.Content: The staff was helpful as always-tips, coupons etc. The Saturday BBQ was rained out, and that was very disappointing. Maybe they could come up with an indoor alternative for bad weather? Hot breakfast everyday was wonderful, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Sunshine863
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel! Oceanfront hotel so you can walk right out the doors and onto the beach. Parking is right there at the hotel which is great considering some hotels you have to walk from across the street. Front desk employees were very nice and check in was very quick. We had a room with a balcony and the view of the ocean was very nice (especially the sunrise). The room was very clean and the beds very comfortable. Breakfast was very good. The breakfast attendent was very nice, greeting everyone, making sure all the counter tops were clean and enough food was always available. I loved that there was a fitness center on my floor right next to my room. Over all I really love this hotel and would definitely come back!

Reviews.Title: “Get weekend get-awau”
Reviews.Author: Lorraine M
Reviews.Content: Great and friendly service. Spacious and clean room on the Atlantic Ocean. Generous breakfast and surprisingly wonderful pool party on Saturday. We will certainly return! Enjoyed the balcony and free wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: “Super Staff”
Reviews.Author: Mike W
Reviews.Content: This was our frist stay at this hotel, but it will not be the last. The rooms were very clean, as well as the grounds. By far the best part about this hotel is the staff. From your first stop at the front desk, to the pool party on Saturday, the staff is friendly and helpful. I think the general manager knew half of the guests by name. We will be regulars from now on.

Reviews.Title: “All around fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Mike L
Reviews.Content: We were skeptical to book almost any hotel in Daytona, because quite frankly they all look a little dingy online. Pulling onto a1a we (myself and my girlfriend) were extremely nervous, seeing all the small, worn out hotels and houses. As soon as we see the Hampton, it was like a breath of fresh air. Building looks good, bigger than i had thought. Upon check in the gentleman working the desk was extremely helpful. Gave us info on the BBQ/pool party, gave recommendations on where to go and eat, and lastly told us that cookies would be ready in about 10 minutes (you could smell them baking). We had a ocean view king room on the 4th floor (room 401). Room was clean, fresh, large and updated. Big tv, microwave, decent sized dorm fridge, balcony, etc. Hallways were all clean, presence of housekeeping is noticeable. Top points: The BBQ/Pool party- fantastic. We grabbed some chairs early just to catch some sun, no intentions of staying for the BBQ. Once the dj got there and the grill fired up we couldn't leave. They had people walking around with jello and pudding shots (both alcoholic and not for the kids). Burgers, hot dogs, beers, sodas, water etc. We met some great people there and everyone had a blast. Free breakfast- The breakfast was good. I would say a little better than your typical hotel breakfast. Different options every day (eggs and sausage one day, biscuits gravy the next) in addition to all the normal bagels, toast, yogurts and fruits. Overall, we did not see any reason to stay anywhere else. Good people, good rooms, good price.

Reviews.Title: “Super Saturday Pool Party”
Reviews.Author: Larry A
Reviews.Content: Wow - what a fantastic weekend stay at the beach! The pool party on Saturday afternoon was super - the DJ kept the party going with a great song selection and a few of the guests gave it their best at the Karaoke. The music kept the crowd happy while the hostess and her team made sure that the grills were producing burgers and dogs and making sure no one ran out of complementary adult beverages. I've never stayed at a place that took better care of their guests. In a word: Awesome! We just got back home and we're already planning another stay before the summer is over.

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Mikey A
Reviews.Content: This was our 5th time staying here and we loved every minute of it. We are looking forward to going back next July. Sandy and her staff treat us like family and we wouldn't want to stay any where else in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: fay w
Reviews.Content: Stayed in May 2012 for two weeks with husband and relations. The location is great, hotel right on the beach. The pool was lovely and clean, went swimming every day. The beds were very comfortable, with bed linen changed every few days. All of the hotel was kept immaculate and all staff went out of their way to help in any way they could. The free breakfast was good, with different hot dishes each day, together with cereals, bread/toast, waffles, fruit, yogurts and cakes; plus fruit juices, tea and coffees. Also free coffee and tea all day in reception. Saw dolphins swimming in sea early morning.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: DJordan1212
Reviews.Content: This is our new favorite! Staff was very friendly. Arrived on a Saturday but did not partake of the pool party, as was very crowed. Went straight for the beach out the back door! Music from the pool was loud even on the beach, which distracted from the peaceful sound from the ocean. Chose an Oceanfront room and was not disappointed! Clean room, great beds, several pillows, and a small fridge. Will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location! Staff could be friendlier!”
Reviews.Author: Julianna72
Reviews.Content: The location for this hotel was great, it is right on the beach! The pool faces the ocean which is really nice. The inside of the hotel downstairs was being worked on while we were there. The rugs are not in good condition but that is probably because of being on the ocean. The rooms were ok but not what we are used to for a Hampton. The staff when checking in was not nice. We had just arrived after a long drive, and we did not feel welcomed at all. We felt we were imposing when asking for beach towels. The hotel has great toys for kids to take to the beach such as boogie boards and sand toys. There is a rental company on the beach that rents chairs and umbrellas. The breakfast was very good and well stocked. The price is good but there are many hotels on that beach strip. If you have kids it would be great but if you are used to better than I would look somewhere else and spend more money.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience”
Reviews.Author: mjdup
Reviews.Content: Would definitely recommend. Complimentary breakfast. Beach towels, beach chairs, and children's beach toys are provided. Free hot dogs, hamburgers and drinks by the pool on Saturdays during the summer. We had an ocean front room. It was excellent. Hotel is very clean.

Reviews.Title: “as always they were superb had great time”
Reviews.Author: southernchef
Reviews.Content: Well Sandy (the manager) and her staff did it again.As usual our visit was just perfect and there was a tropical storm that came thru(Beryl) that tried to ruin the weekend.The storm at least stayed away until Sunday so the poolside cookout/karaoke on Saturday went off as planned which consists of free hamburgers/hotdogs, chips, sodas, beer, water, and Sandys yummy rum punch and pudding shots and that was great, but oh boy on Sunday the wind and rain came and the pool and beach were off limits.We would like to thank Sandy for our room upgrade,it was a very pleasant suprise and deeply deeply appreciated. We are so looking forward to next year which will be our 4th year in a row!!!!Our room was spotless as usual, breakfast was good and typical of the Hamptons, and the staff in the breakfast area were very curteous and kept the foods stocked and the dining area clean which was no small feat as it was a madhouse( thats putting it mildly lol )The pool area was again excellent in its upkeep, with a young man out there early in the morning with a hose cleaning all of the tables and chairs and the pool deck so that they are ready for the guests.Any information that was needed ie:directions, dining options, etc: was readily available from the front desk staff. Well Sandy as usual you know how to do it right !!! We will see you next Memorial Day Weekend.Keep up the great job !!! Thank you Rose

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place for vacation”
Reviews.Author: tahiti88
Reviews.Content: This is our second time staying at the Hampton Inn. I highly recommend it if you want a clean comfortable hotel with ocean view. Free breakfast is included and the pool is convenient and well maintained. A free barbecue at the pool with music is available on Saturday for all guests, and pool toys/buggie boards are free to use. There are laundry facilities on site and a nice exercise room. Free cookies are put out at 7:30pm and the staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are quiet and offer flat screen TV , table for laptops or eating, microwave and fridge and ice makers in the hallway. A good choice for families or couples. Free coffee and tea 24 hours off the breakfast area is also a nice feature and the view from the balcony is breathtaking! The AC is a bit noisy and takes some getting used to if running all night and parking is available around the sides and back of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Go to this hotel”
Reviews.Author: clay d
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the South part of Daytona Beach called Daytona Beach Shores. During the Summer they have a free cookout and music on Saturdays. That includes free beer. The hotel is directly on the beach with great views. We were given a free 2 day stay by the manager when she found out we were celebrating our 41st wedding anniversity. Yes-We will be back.The hotel has great management.

Reviews.Title: “I'm ready to go back!”
Reviews.Author: BradMagilla
Reviews.Content: As I write this, I am sitting at my computer desk sipping a cup of coffee, trying to wake up. What a difference this morning's scenery is from yesterday's. Yesterday morning, I was sitting out on my balcony at the Hampton Inn, watching the sun rise, and sipping fresh coffee I didn't have to make. This was my third time staying at the Hampton Inn-Daytona Shores. I am always impressed with how courteous and efficient the staff is. When I arrived this time, my room was toward the end of the hotel. I had a view of the beach but also the parking lot. I went down to see if they had a room overlooking the pool, and the gentleman, I don't recall his name, immediately and without complaint moved us actually to the room I had on my last visit, with a view of the ocean in front, and a view of the pool to the right. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable and like you're home and part of the Hampton Inn family. I always look forward to seeing Rachel at the front desk for the first time on my visit, who remembers me from my previous visits and always cheerfully welcomes me back. Coffee is in abundance at this establishment. There is a coffee pot in the room, as well as a refrigerator and a microwave. But, we never even touched the coffee pot in the room, as there was always coffee in the lobby. One morning, I went to get coffee and as I filled my cup, one of the staff said, "Put that down. I'm getting you fresh coffee." We slept in one morning and had a do not disturb sign on the door. Later, there was a message on the phone from the front desk, saying that the cleaning person noticed the do not disturb sign, and that if there was anything we needed, please let them know. I said we could use some fresh towels but we would pick them up the next time we passed the desk. Next thing I knew, there was a cleaning person at the door, with fresh towels. She also came in and tidied up a little for us. There are several eating establishments within walking distance, as well as a 7-11 across the street. The location is also convenient for traveling by bus. Adding to the convenience is the breakfast they serve. You don't have to go out and find a place that serves breakfast. You have your choice of cereals, eggs, sausage, etc. right there. Oh, yeah, and did I mention coffee? This week, they were down to one elevator at one point, only because they were putting in non-slip floors on both of the elevators. But work on both elevators was done in two days (one per day), and when I left, both were in use again. The Hampton Inn Daytona Shores has become my home away from home when I'm in Daytona. I'm already looking forward to my next visit there.

Reviews.Title: “What a great weekend...”
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend both the property and the destination! I used to go to Daytona every year after college. I am so pleased with the changes in the city. This is a very up and coming family vacation spot. Didn't stay at the Hampton until early this month. Entire experience was excellent check-in to check-out. Sandy (general manager) and her team are awesome without exception. Beachfront Saturday lunch pool party was amazing...Can't wait to return next Summer!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome weekend in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: tom e
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at this location and everything from the check in process to checking out on Sunday was awesome!! The manager had a Saturday cookout for the guest that was great with food and entertainment. It appeared that almost every guest attended and had a great time. The staff here is excellent and you can tell they really love their jobs. Thanks for the good time!! Tom E.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Wildwoodmark27
Reviews.Content: After staying in Pirates Cove and finding German roaches everywhere we left there and went to the Hampton Inn. Never thought I would live a hotel so much. It's great and very friendly. Awesome breakfast and it's free. Pool is ok but right next to beach so that is great. Away from the main strip but far enough away to get away from overcrowding places. Book it without question.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel !”
Reviews.Author: kchurch
Reviews.Content: very nice and quiet hotel front desk very nice and helpful 5 minutes from all the action at the pier

Reviews.Title: “Sleeping to the Sound of the Surf”
Reviews.Author: P H
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a nice, comfortable reasonably priced hotel on the beach than this is it. Our check in Manager was pleasant and helpful, pointing out nearby points of interest, (in our case a Super Market and Liquor Store). No we are not boozers but had been invited to a friends for dinner! Now for the hotel! On the white sand beach, clean beachside deck and pool, the beautiful ocean what more could you wish for. A room on the oceanfront, up high with a nice terrace, clean and comfortable bedding, a microwave, mini fridge and the sound of the surf, well you have it. Free breakfast simple but hey don't waste time inside, hit the beach! Have Fun! Remember this is a chain this is what you get. And for a chain this choice is excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great beachfront hotel”
Reviews.Author: jujuvgolf
Reviews.Content: It's nice you can always count on a Hampton Inn. This one met all the high standards with a VERY helpful front desk staff, breakfast staff, and general maintenance (pool and public areas) staff. We took an oceanfront room and enjoyed sitting on the balcony watching the waves roll in. They even had a Saturday cookout for the guests, but we had to leave before it began. Nice touch!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Top-Notch, Family Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Tricia J
Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel and staff. Our stay May 26 & 27 was incredibly "Family Friendly, and the personable staff added to a wonderful stay - even though a tropical storm was moving into the area" The staff was all friendly and ready to meet any needs that arose during our stay. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting "super" clean room and a courteous staff. The warm breakfast is incredible, and all the employees were very friendly, always taking time to say Hello and make sure all our needs were being taken care of. Hope our family will get to come back to stay here in the future. Virginia D

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service and family friendly”
Reviews.Author: Mia T
Reviews.Content: All of the Hotel staff are warm and friendly. We were greeted kindly and complimentary apples in the reception area. Complimentary beach chairs are a nice touch. Saturday summer free hamburgers, hot dogs, chips and drinks! Free warm breakfast to start our day, and their famous evening cookies are a delight after a day on the beach and a swim in the pool. Overall, a clean, safe, and feel good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice beach front hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chelle4463
Reviews.Content: This Hampton Inn appears to be a family run beach front hotel. The staff was great, very friendly. I really appreciated that beach chairs and towels could be taken off the property and on to the beach. Perfect location and seemed sleepier than Daytona to the north. Lobby and rooms were clean. I thought our room had a musty smell, but I would guess that is common in such a humid area. Loved the balcony. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Staff”
Reviews.Author: karen1981_12
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best Hotel experience I have ever had. Not only was the Hotel clean and comfortable, the staff was "amazing". They made you feel like you were their only customer. They took the time out of their busy day to stop and say hello and ask if everything was okay. I had such a wonderful experience and will be bringing my family back. Kudos to Sandy Ellis, John Ellis, Kyle for saving us cookies, Bill and Shawn just to name a few. If I have left out some I am so sorry, but everyone on your staff was wonderful! And Kudos to Hampton Inn for a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: NancyW5
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay at the Hampton Inn and it was AWESOME! The location was great with a grocery store just down the street, souvenir shops close by along with a couple of restaurants. All the staff were extremely friendly and went out of their way to accommodate anything we asked for. Sandy Ellis was just terrific in making sure we had adjoining rooms with ocean view. John, Kyle, Donna and Maureen at the front desk were always pleasant and helpful in recommending restaurants. Bill and Sean also were very nice and friendly. The rooms were large and very clean, breakfast was more than I expected and the cookies at night were a sweet treat to end our fun filled day. I am looking forward to staying there again this summer with my family and again next year for the girlfriends getaway!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and service”
Reviews.Author: bebemm2001
Reviews.Content: Awesome location right on the beach, great value, decent breakfast, great service.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: BellaNWOhio
Reviews.Content: We stayed here three nights while in town for a wedding shower. It was very quiet. We were on the top floor overlooking the ocean. The staff was friendly and the breakfast buffet was well stocked. Parking is a little tight and you may have to park across the street if you get in late. However, it is free. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING HOTEL AND STAFF”
Reviews.Author: littleyorkies
Reviews.Content: My experience at this hotel is always GREAT. We have been coming here for the past 3 years and always have a wonderful experience. Our room was very clean and housekeeping does its job well. The breakfast buffet served a fabulous spread and everything was hot. The front desk employees are extremely friendly and accomodating. I would definately recommend this hotel and rate this a FIVE STAR experience.

Reviews.Title: “relaxing holiday”
Reviews.Author: delighted05
Reviews.Content: we had one night here after a cruise to the Bahamas. the hotel was very clean, staff friendly and helpfull. enjoyed relaxing by the pool before making for our flight home. Sorry the stay was so short

Reviews.Title: “Well Beyond Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Neal W
Reviews.Content: We were looking for an affordable beachfront hotel for a few days in Daytona, without the hidden fees of so many places. This place was perfect! No hidden fees for parking, wi-fi, morning paper, beach towels, etc. The continental breakfast was huge... and better than most restaurants.And the gal taking care of the breakfast her name was Bea) was great. (Note...they don't allow tip cups...but she deserved one.) Nice pool, with complimentary chairs and toys for anyone wanting to take them down on the beach. Everyone was friendly...everyone. And with the place fully booked for someone's wedding over the weekend... this would have been the time to see any problems. Great desk staff...they made sure we had anything we needed...and the fresh-baked cookies at the desk every night was a nice touch. Great room with flatscreen TV and comfy bed. I guess I need to find something wrong... so let's pick on the sliding door to the balcony (large balcony with chairs & table)...the door was hard to slide. I'm leaving our facebook name so you'll know we're not employees. :) We will make this our hotel every time from now on.

Reviews.Title: “Not my favorite Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: Uphototraveler
Reviews.Content: The beach location was very nice, but I've stayed at much better Hampton Inns and was pretty disappointed. We got a King oceanfront balcony room. The door itself when entering the room was gross and really need replacing. The bed itself was okay, but the mattress was not very comfortable - surprising for a Hampton. Also, the room itself was very tired and in need of repair. The closet door was broken and would not stay closed, so swung open into the walkway and you had to be careful not to walk into it. This was broken before we arrived, so should've been fixed. The breakfast also was not up to the Hampton Inn standard. The servers were friendly, but the food wasn't good and we wound up eating out at a restaurant instead. Also, to get beach/pool towels you have to go to the front desk and check them out by signing a card with your room number. I've never heard of such a thing, and it was just a minor annoyance every time we wanted to go. Overall, the place isn't terrible but was just not the typical Hampton Inn, and we felt that we overpaid for what we received.

Reviews.Title: “Not the Hampton Inn you know”
Reviews.Author: 4q2
Reviews.Content: This is not the typical Hampton Inn. The staff is friendly and courteous but seem to be limited by management/ownership in their ability to really be helpful. Everything was clean but seemed tired. The famous Hampton breakfast was very limited. The pool was decent enough and the beach IS the famous Daytona beach. It is wide and great. Overall, it wasn't bad but it just wasn't good, either.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was excellent”
Reviews.Author: Shane H
Reviews.Content: I was welcomed each day I stayed there by the nicest people and the rooms, location, breakfast was all very good.

Reviews.Title: “Service was excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: G D
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean and comfortable as well as large enough to accommodate a roll-away bed on par with other Hampton Inns, but the overall service of this hotel was outstanding. The staff went out of their way to make us feel like family. We had such a good time we didn't want to leave. There were beach toys for the kids as well as pool toys. The pool itself is large enough for kids to swim and not be bothered by others playing with water toys. There are enough poolside tables with umbrellas for groups to gather and have fun. We would definitely stay there again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, but a very tired-looking hotel!”
Reviews.Author: southernmeadowsnana
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this Hampton Inn 4 times in the last fifteen years. We like the location and returned here because of a good AAA rate we got for 3 nights in an ocean front king room. But we were disappointed that they have done very little to update the hotel. The lobby and the rooms look just like they did 15 years ago (with the exception on a flat screen TV-which was nice.) Most Hamptons have updated their bathrooms to granite counters, and have more updated decor in the lobby. The bedspread and shower curtains were wrinkled, but probably because they are laundered between guests- which is good. We had a nice refrigerator and microwave, and 2 comfy chairs. Our bed slept well, and we had a great AC unit. We love sitting on our private balcony watching the ocean and beach activities. We enjoyed the warm cookies each evening and 24hr. coffee. The breakfast was okay-but not great. They cram 53 people in their small dining area, and we could hardly eat our breakfast for people bumping into us, multiple trips to get their breakfast. One morning we opted to go across the street to Dennys, and enjoyed our Grand Slam breakfast-in a very relaxed atmosphere! But the day we left, we went down for breakfast at 6:30 am-when it was still quiet and the food was fresh. The front desk clerks were nice and gave suggestions where to go for dinner. If you don't have a car there is a Red Lobster, Denny's, and an Italian restaurant within walking distance. The front desk clerk suggested Racings North Turn, but we wished we had just gone to Red Lobster-for better food. We did enjoy Bubba Gump's Shrimp down on Daytona Beach at the Boardwalk- it was great! I had read reviews about pool parties on Saturdays, but there was no pool party the Sat. we were there.I think next time we'll stay down near the Boardwalk, where all the good restaurants and fun activities are. There are lots of nice hotels and condos near the Boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, but older property”
Reviews.Author: bscotthome
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with the staff, who were without exception, very friendly and customer focused. They made us feel welcome and were very attentive to our needs. The property itself was directly on the beach with a wonderful view of the Atlantic. Our room had a balcony facing the ocean. Many of the rooms, including ours, had exterior hallways. We did not feel unsafe at all but many people do not like exterior halls. The air conditioner was a little louder than we thought it should be. No extra fees for parking! Overall, we were pleased with our stay and felt it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfuel place for a beach vacation”
Reviews.Author: Lee N
Reviews.Content: We stayed there Apirl 4, 2012. This is truly a great place for a beach vacation. The room s were spacious, clean and the A/C works great!! The staff is some of the best at any hotel we have ever stayed at in a number of years. The complimentary breakfast is excellent and the freshly baked cookies in the evening go fast and arre wonderful!!

Reviews.Title: “Great getaway and yet feels like you're staying with family”
Reviews.Author: gator1006
Reviews.Content: This Hampton is the best place to stay in Daytona Beach, Florida. From the minute you walk in the front door, the staff is always there making sure you have a great stay with no stress and great experiences. They will do anything to make sure you are enjoying your stay, from the smiles or the items (towels, chairs, toys, skim boards) that you can borrow to take down to the beach to enjoy, especially if you are from out of town. The breakfast is great and the cookies are a welcome snack at night. It is truly a family-oriented hotel and Sandy Ellis is the manager of the year in my book!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service!”
Reviews.Author: rblock49
Reviews.Content: We were driving down to the west coast of Florida at the end of Dec. and our first beach stop was at the Daytona Beach Hampton Inn. The front desk was extremely friendly and very helpful with dinner suggestions. Our room was nice with a flat screen TV,comfortable beds, and after seeing the view from our balcony we decided to walk on the beach. I locked our cash in the safe and enjoyed the immediate access to the beach.The next morning I forgot to check the safe and realized it upon our arrival on the West Coast. I called the front desk and the young man called the room to see if he could check the safe. He called me back that he would have to wait for the guests to return but would call us later. Amazingly, he called with wonderful news that he had found our money. He and the General Manager mailed me a check to arrive at our next destination. I was so happy and impressed that this hotel values service and honesty above all.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: DeeDee134
Reviews.Content: The hotel is older, but in fair-good condition, and the rooms include a mini refrigerator and a microwave. The bedding and furniture had been updated at some point. The bed was too soft for us, but the pillows were comfy.The pool and spa are not well maintained at all, but there are plenty of lounge chairs and towels are provided. However, the beach is accessible from the pool area. Hot and cold breakfast is included. The best part is most of the rooms face the ocean. We were on the 8th floor and had a beautiful view of the beach and ocean and even watched a pod of dolphins a couple of days. All the rooms, but the first floor have balconies with a couple of chairs and a small table, which is nice, but there were these tiny fly-like bugs that bite and we were not able to stay out there and we couldn't enjoy the nice breeze and listen to the surf because there are no screen doors. Screen doors or screened balconies would be a huge plus. The staff was friendly and helpful. There are restaurants and shops within walking distance. We would return.

Reviews.Title: “OK, But Dated”
Reviews.Author: lchjr
Reviews.Content: We've actually stayed here before this most recent one night stay. Like so many of the hotels in Daytona Beach, this hotel shows its age. It's sad to see Daytona Beach stagnate from a tourism point of view. The Hampton Inn is still probably one of the nicer places on the beach as so many of the hotels were built many, many years ago and need serious updating. The location is about three miles south of the center of the beach area, so is in a quieter area. The lobby is 1970's spartan, and could use some refurbishing. Our beachfront room was comfortable, with a good bed, flat screen TV, etc. But the walls, fixtures and carpet showed their age (admittedly it's difficult to keep beach hotels in great shape). There were only a few people staying there the night we were there, so we didn't understand why we were given a room where you had to walk outside to get to your room (it was a very cold day for Daytona)---half of the beachfront rooms have interior access, and most of those were probably empty. The breakfast buffet was on par for Hampton Inns, and the front desk staff were generally friendly. Obvioulsly we didn't use the outdoor pool, but it didn't look like anything special. Our rooms was overpriced on this Sunday before the start of Speed Weeks. Hardly anyone was there, but they had already inflated the room price a bit. Overall, probably not a bad place to stay in Daytona, but not up to the contemporary standards of Hampton Inns.

Reviews.Title: “Yellow "tub" Waters run deep”
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: My wife travels 5 days a week and stays at Hilton hotels usually 6 weeks at same hotel across the country and this is by far her most unpleasant Hilton experience yet. She has just sent me a picture of her tub filling and even though the hotel claims they checked it the water is yellow. Usually if there are any problems you can count on Hilton Hotels to make it right however this hotel is beach front so they seem to be of the belief that if you don't like it we have a waiting list of people who will. These Hilton hotels become her home for months at the same hotel so the staff is who is entrusted with her well being and I feel this is not Hilton behavior. This may be a case of just bad luck however the only answer the hotel is giving is the water was fine when we looked "See picture below". Having to stay in Daytona for the next couple months the thought of yellow water baths and showers isn't very appealing.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: BrookeH09
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was very friendly, made terrific dinner recommendations, and were very gracious when we were running a few minutes late for check out. The room was very clean. The cookies were a nice touch too!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for a beach front stay”
Reviews.Author: jrzj42
Reviews.Content: Typical Hampton Inn … breakfast and Wi-Fi are included in the nightly fee. No parking fee, but you do need to display a parking pass. Room was always clean. Staff was above average on friendliness. Interesting in that the ocean side of the hotel is split between parking and pool/hot tub. I did not use the hot tub, but had heard that the temperature was hotter than expected. Pool was heated, but was luke warm. Not a good location if you need to be near where most of the action is, but the drive is a short 10 minutes to the major attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is nice and good location”
Reviews.Author: MOTHEROFTRAVLERSON
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the best hotel we've stayed at in Daytona. The service here is very good. The breakfast is excellent. We enjoyed the nightly free cookies very much.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed this time.”
Reviews.Author: J G
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here many times over the past 7 years. Up until this visit I have always been very pleased with this Hampton Inn. When I stayed here in November of 2011 I was not. The check in went fine the front desk person was very nice and asked if I had stayed here before. After I checked in I put my bags in my room and then left to meet some friends I was having dinner with. I arrived back at the hotel around 1:00am. When I got to my room I found the following: Dried tooth paste all over the sink, Hair in the bathtub in several places, hair on the toilet seat, 2 bottle caps on the chairs and table and many crumbs all over the carpet area. Because it was so late I did not complain because I had to leave very early the next morning for Orlando. When I came back the next evening after a long day of business the bathroom had been cleaned thoroughly, but the rest of the issues I listed here were the same. I was supposed to stay for 4 nights but only ended up staying for 2 because I was so dissapointed. I received an email from Hilton to rate my stay and let them know about the issues, but never heard back from the hotel. I don't know if I will stay here again. Sad.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: RFJW
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I have just spent 9 nights at this Hotel, It was comfortable, room was large, very clean and most of all the staff were fantastic, welcoming and always had time for the congenial chat.they were a credit to the Hotel chain. We were sad to leave on Friday 2nd and look forward to returning next year we hope. We will miss the warm cookies and banter with the evening staff.

Reviews.Title: “great location for morning dolphin watch”
Reviews.Author: Dr Richard O
Reviews.Content: We stayed here sept 26th 2011 for 3 nights. There was plenty of parking, the lobby was clean and check in was quick. The staff was always friendly. At the check in desk they always have tooth paste or other toiletries in case you forgot them at home. Warm cookies were out every evening around 4-7pm. There is a red lobster 1 block south as well as dennys. A gift shop across the street and a publix grocery store 2 blocks north. The oceanfront rooms were clean, spacious and had very comfy beds. The internet was fast and the sun rises were almost as fast and very beautiful. All 3 mornings we saw baby dolphins chasing fish in the breaking waves right in front of the hotel. The waves were so much fun as we did boogie boarding each and every day. The complimentary hot breakfast was very good with a different main entee each morning. The pool was big enough with plenty of comfortable chairs and the hot tub was in a secluded spot . There was a large box next to the gate down to the beach with misc beach stuff in it that is free to use. The beach is very clean and wide in front of the hampton. They recently renovated this hampton hotel and we believe it is much better than any other hotel in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel Stay”
Reviews.Author: DebFL
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two days at the Hampton Inn. The hotel is nicely located right on the beach towards the southern end. Their are many grocery stores & restaurants close by. The hotel is clean, staff is very nice and the breakfast in the morning is good. Its serve yourself style with cereal,eggs,sausage, bagels etc, fruit, and make your own waffles. They also have coffee and tea available at all times. Our room was on the 7th floor facing the ocean. The room is spacious and includes a microwave and small refrigerator. Unfortunately the beds were more on the hard side and were uncomfortable to us. Views of the beach from our small balcony were beautiful. The hotel also has a pool with a small jacuzzi spa. I have stayed at Hampton Hotels before and they really do take pride in their hotel appearance as well as their excellent service to customers.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: mad4nc
Reviews.Content: Spent two nights here last weekend. Hotel was nice. Everything seemed well taken care of. Staff was friendly and helpful. Ocean facing rooms have nice size balconies with chairs. Great hot breakfast. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hot Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Janet N
Reviews.Content: Just returned from trip to Daytona Beach, stayed at the Hampton Inn on the beach. All was clean and cheery. Staff was very friendly. Loved the hot breakfast, gourmet coffee and tea available in lobby at all times, cookies at desk in evening hours. Almost like a cruise. Will go there again.

Reviews.Title: “7 day stay in Hampton Inn, Daytona Beach Shores.”
Reviews.Author: annschenk
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times because of the employees. The entire staff goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is great. The entire hotel,pool ect is immaculate. There are alot of long term employees. That is always a good sign. We have recomended it to many friends and will continue. Thanks again. Jim Kidwell and Ann Schenk .

Reviews.Title: “Awesome staff.”
Reviews.Author: LBenko
Reviews.Content: We were personally shown room options by the hotel manager to make sure we were happy with our accomodations. Nice hotel, great loacation. We enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: Mary B
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean and had the absolutely most friendly and helpful staff I have encountered in quite a while. The room was clean and comfortable, very nice size with refridgerator and microwave. Great breakfast, lots of variety. This would be my first choice of hotel in the Daytona area.

Reviews.Title: “Just Like Home”
Reviews.Author: salarina51
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Daytona Beach Shores Oceanfront for nine days September 17th through the 25th and it felt like home. The front desk people were always polite and helpful. It was always a friendly homey atmosphere. Best breakfast...every morning a great hot meal. The grounds were very well kept. Our room was clean and the housekeeping staff did a great job addressing our needs. Our thanks to Sandy, John, Donna, Rachel, Kyle, Maureen and Ana for a great time. We will be back next year and will tell our friends what a nice homey place it is.

Reviews.Title: “Great view of Atlantic Ocean”
Reviews.Author: daisymaeToronto
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we have stayed at this hotel.It was very clean and the staff were very friendly.We had a great view of the Atlantic Ocean,although we didn't swim in the ocean because of all the dead jelly fish along the shore.There had to be over a hundred of them.We did see dolphins from our balcony.Great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time”
Reviews.Author: RunnerGirl1958
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd time staying here, and the first time attending the summer pool party. Free burgers, dogs, chips, soda, beer, rum punch (and others) .... and Jell-O Shots! They had a very good DJ/Karaoke set up at poolside that played great music and provided low-key family fun. The participants were fun to watch and everyone had a wonderful afternoon. A really nice family event overlooking the beach and Atlantic Ocean. The rooms were very nice and the staff was great. This is a clean, well cared for hotel and the staff seems to care that you are well taken care of. Free, freshly made, warm cookies every evening and better than expected buffet breakfasts each morning. We had a small group and wanted to watch our college football game during the afternoon pool party. They graciously accommodated our use of the dining area wide screen. Our stay was for 5 days and it couldn't have been better. For the money and quality this place can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: Donna D
Reviews.Content: We had such a relaxed and wonderful time! The kids had so much fun! We will come back soon!

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: kmistry953
Reviews.Content: A true example of a very well run establishment,our group checked in on Friday for the long weekend and we were showered with nothing else but pleasantries by the staff and the management.We were lucky enough to get our rooms ocean front and the view was nothing short of magnificent.The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfortable with extra pillows.The next day Hotel hosted a barbecue and karaoke for all the guests which lasted till late evening it was way too much fun.Everybody from our group of 12 had nothing else short of praises for this at Hampton Inn and i credit the management for a well run especially Sandy & Donna.You guys will see back soon and we will defintely tell othe people about you. Thanks for a wonerful experience. K.M

Reviews.Title: “One of the best Hampton Inns I have ever stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: Larry4341
Reviews.Content: I addition to the normal Hampton Inn amenities, they had a free Saturday cookout & DJ, provided towels for the beach, and toys & boogie boards for the kids to use at the beach. A local Sunday paper was provided to all rooms .... something I have never seen at a Hampton Inn before. Could not have been more convenient ... walk out the lobby to the pool and out the pool gate to the beach. All of the hotel staff ... and especially the desk clerks ... were friendly and helpful. They even provided free stamps for my postcards ... yeah, I know this is minor but it just shows their mindset.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for beach”
Reviews.Author: Tracy Y
Reviews.Content: free internet access, free breakfast, free 24 hour coffee, free cookies at night (not a lot in Orlando comes free!!) This hotel is right on the beach fantastic sea view rooms, staff great, pool great, rooms clean & with balconies If you are looking for a few nights away from the hustle & bustle from the parks just to chill out at the beach I would definitely recommend this hotel. Plenty of beach/pool toys for the kids to play with, even some beach chairs for you to take to the beach with you. We stayed during the week and had the pool to ourselves. Daytona speedway not far away should you wish tour there we would definitely come back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Huntersville
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this Hampton Inn (just a few miles S of downtown Daytona Beach, less than a 10 min drive) multiple times now. The staff is great, usually not as crowded as many Hampton Inns for breakfast, and pool and hot tub right on the beach. It was an excellent value (if you pre-pay on the Hilton/Hampton site for the best advance rate, its an even better deal). Will continue to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great place on the beach...clean & spacious rooms!”
Reviews.Author: Packersmama
Reviews.Content: Our family of 5 stayed a couple of nights here. This hotel is right on the beach and was very clean. A great family friendly hotel, no partys. Every employee we encountered was kind and helpful....they seemed to actually be happy to be at work! We had a very large room with 2 queen beds and a sleeper sofa. Beds were ok, a little hard, but still comfy. Linens were new and very clean. We paid extra to have a beach view room. The only down side is that the rooms with the sofa sleeper ane only on the ground floor and do not have direct beach access and do not have any balcony. They are larger on the inside, though and it was just down from the breakfast area, so getting to the beach was fast. We just didn't have anywhere except the shower rod to hang wet swim suits and towels. Bathroom was clean and had a good sized counter, water pressure in shower was great. Towels were extra thick and felt extravagant! Breakfast was the usual, but Hamptons in Florida offer a wonderful fresh fruit salad! Always, warm cookies in the evenings, too. We never used the pool, but there was a storage area that had beach toys and boogie boards for guest to use for free! Our kids really had a great time with them. We walked across the street to a great Italian restaurant...can't remember the name, but the 5 of us left stuffed for less than $65 including the tip....best egg plant parmisan ever! Great for vegetarians and meat eater alike!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it and going back!”
Reviews.Author: PapaJojo
Reviews.Content: My husband was going to Daytona for business so I went with him, brought our grandkids. The company had rooms blocked at a supposed upscale hotel 5 miles further north. When we arrived we checked the room and area and I decided I did not like the hotel, or the area, and did not feel safe having my small grandchildren there. We went to the Hampton based on remarks on Trip Advisor, and because I lived in Port Orange 20 years ago I was familiar with the area. When we arrived I asked to look at a room and was allowed to check the room. It was great! The hotel is wonderful. Great area, great staff, great fun. On Saturday they had a pool party, with DJ, hamburgers, hot dogs, drinks, etc. The hotel is steps from the beach in a safe location for families with kids. The desk gave us recommendations for dinner. There is a Publix just up the street to get sandwiches, drinks, and the room has a refrigerator and microwave. Breakfast is great each morning. I talked to many people at the pool and discovered they are return customers and make this hotel a place for family to gather. My husband and I enjoyed the trip so much we booked another visit before we left. I have to say staying in Daytona this weekend at this hotel made he rethink some of the trips we take to Key West. Loved It.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Carver_71
Reviews.Content: I am a Hilton Honors Diamond member, and I can say without question this is one of the most courteous and professional staffs I have seen at any Hilton property! After our recent stay, I mistakenly left my toiletry kit at check out which contained my eye glasses and electric razor. Upon realizing my mistake I called the hotel and was told that it had been found, and they shipped it to me at no charge. The Saturday pool party that Sandy and her staff put on has something for the entire family. Karaoke, free food and drinks, and prizes! The free hot breakfast is also a plus for family's on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful beachfront location with a staff that goes beyond the expected.”
Reviews.Author: JeffChicagoChicago
Reviews.Content: We just returned from another great trip to the Hampton Inn in Daytona Beach Shores. The management and staff at the Hampton Inn do such a great job, I have to share our experience with anyone considering a beach front vacation in central Florida. We have had a family vacation in Daytona Beach Shores for the past three years. The first two years, we had eleven at the Hampton Inn. This year, we had thirteen ranging in age from four to seventy-five, and we were again at the Hampton Inn. It was another wonderful trip The Hotel: What sets this hotel apart from the rest is the management and staff. Sandy Ellis is the General Manager and has put together a great team. On any given day you can find her behind the front desk, in the breakfast area helping guests with the freshly made waffles or mingling with the crowd at the Saturday BBQ, karaoke pool party, which is complimentary by the way. The hotel is clean and well maintained. The entire staff does their best to make your stay enjoyable. This includes the front desk when you check in or when you are looking for the 7:30 p.m. freshly baked cookies. The housekeeping staff does a great job keeping your room and towels fresh during your stay. If you occasionally see them in the halls, don’t be surprised if they ask “How is your stay?” The same goes for the young man who neatens and sprays down the pool deck around 7:00 a.m. every morning. “Good morning, sir.” Each morning there is a large breakfast buffet served, which includes hot and cold options. This is a huge benefit for our group. We get a Dennny’s / IHOP-type breakfast, at no additional cost, with no wait right at the hotel. The ladies that put this together are wonderful. The food is continuously replenished and the dining area and tables are kept clean. Breakfast starts at 6:00 a.m., which is great for me. And it is served until 10:00 a.m., which is great for my teenage kids. The Hampton Inn also offers a few unexpected niceties. Three years ago, during our first visit, we noticed a BBQ around the pool with a D.J. and karaoke. We then learned it was for all hotel guests and joined in on the fun. (Had we only read all the signs around the hotel and in the elevator earlier.) My youngest child was singing karaoke a short while later. This is truly a great time for kids and adults alike. This year we arrived at the hotel on a Saturday around 2:00 p.m. Our first stop after checking in was at the BBQ for grilled hotdogs, hamburgers and cheeseburgers. The Hampton Inn also collects beach chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards that past guest have left behind. These are not provided by the hotel and are offered on a first come, first served basis. Many guests, including us, purchase these items when they arrive for a beach vacation. They are often left behind when the guests leave. The Hampton Inn has two large bins on the pool deck where items left behind are collected. You can take a chair, umbrella or boogie board to use on the beach and then return it when you are done. Best advice is to get there early, because these are hot items. Then there are the freshly baked cookies at the front desk at 7:30 p.m. every evening. They are great. If you think this is just a trite gesture, your opinion will change when you see the kids and adults gathered at the front desk around 7:15, and then taste the cookies at 7:30. The Dining: There are many good restaurants within 10 minutes of the Hampton Inn. If you are looking for a recommendation, ask Sandy Ellis (G.M.). One night she suggested Our Deck Down Under. She told us who to ask for and said to tell the person that Sandy sent us. We were immediately seated, despite the long line and had a wonderful dinner. Other good restaurants within a few minutes are Boondocks on Peninsula Drive, Crabby Joe’s on Sunglow Pier and Ocean Deck on A1A in Daytona Beach. A special favorite for our group is JB’s Fish Camp in New Smyrna Beach just off of A1A (I think), but that is about 30 minutes from the hotel. Another great option for our group was eating dinner in the hotel. Publix grocery store is about a minute from the hotel by car. They have broasted chicken, sandwiches, fruit, salad, etc. On a few nights we all went our own directions, whether to the Publix or a restaurant, and returned to the hotel to eat together in the common area where breakfast is served. The Location: The Hampton Inn is directly on the beach. Downtown Daytona Beach is a 5 minute drive to the north. Ponce Inlet is a five minute drive to the south. The Orlando theme parks are a 75 minute drive southwest. One day, some of our group drove to the Orlando Disney parks in the morning and then returned to the Hampton Inn in time for an evening dip in the ocean. The beach is just steps from the hotel and is gorgeous. The beach is clean, level and has few rocks or shells, which makes it easy on the feet if you are walking without shoes. The beach also has a smooth transition into the water, which makes for a friendly entry into the ocean. This is great for kids in particular. The sun rises over the water and is a spectacular view, if you are up in time to see it. Also, the beach never felt crowded. It is approximately 500 feet wide and goes for miles to the north and to the south of the Hampton Inn. The Daytona International Speedway is about 15 minutes away. The castle in St. Augustine and the Canaveral National Seashore are within an hour. There is also deep sea fishing and golf within 15 minutes. The Bottom Line: This is a well managed, well maintained beachfront hotel with many complimentary perks for its guests. We highly recommend this hotel if you are considering a trip to this area. Jeff from Chicago

Reviews.Title: “We loved it - Excellent”
Reviews.Author: PlayHard05
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay here, and we loved it just like our first stay. The Saturday pool bash was lots of fun. My kids really enjoyed the pool and the party. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “What a Great Experience, we will be back”
Reviews.Author: carl31548
Reviews.Content: The rooms were neat and clean. Price was great compared to other hotels with similar offerings. The staff was very professional and helpful and we were very satisfied with our total experience. The manager hosted a cookout on the patio by the pool for all guests. There was involvement by all the patrons that were in the pool area. There was karaoke and a hoola hoop competition for children and adults. The atmosphere was upbeat and everyone seemed to be treated fairly and enjoyed themselves. What a great experience!!!!! Will be back soon. Great Ocean View and Hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “This is out fourth visit.”
Reviews.Author: cindyjodow
Reviews.Content: Evertime we visit I get more and more impressed with the way this place is run.I feel like a part of the family and always treated grand. Every employee, evertime speaks to us with maybe a Hello or How is your visit and if there is anything we can do just call. You don't get this ANYWHERE! The Saturday pool party's are great fun and at the end of the day we are making plans for our next visit. Sandy does a great job running the place and makes everyone feel like we are very special. What a catch you have with her. Thanks again and see you all soon.

Reviews.Title: “Best Beach getaway yet!”
Reviews.Author: Odoboy
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn Daytona Shores - Oceanfront is a great value and fun time. The rooms are very clean and the oceanfront view is fantastic. The free breakfast buffet will satisfy anyone's appetite and desires. The Summer Saturday Pooldeck party was a unexpected perk that provided burgers, hot dogs and drinks for free for the afternoon. They also had a kareoke contest that kept the party going. Beach access was easy and the beach was very clean as well. Boogie Boards were available for use for the guests. And don't forget the free fresh cookies at 7:30 at the front desk!

Reviews.Title: “OLD HOTEL BUT NICE, FRIENDLY STAFF”
Reviews.Author: CHUKIE383
Reviews.Content: We checked in for one night at this hotel. I was initially a bit scared by the age of the building, but it turned out ok. The hotel is an old property -- the hallways are a bit dingy, but the rooms have been reworked and renovated and we were fine. We had an oceanfront room with rollaway and a balcony and it worked out well. The staff is very friendly, you can walk out to pool deck and down from there to the beach. The outdoor pool has a hot tub also. The staff as I said was very friendly. Five minutes after our check in Donna at the Front Desk, (who checked us in) call to see if everything was ok. Also, they recommended a great restaurant on the beach, Racing's North Turn, which turned out to be a great recommendation. Food was good as was the music and informal beach atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: getbit_98
Reviews.Content: This is just a good place to stay. Nothig exceptional but nothing bad either. Morning Buffet was very nice. You didnt have to leave a deposit or drivers license to use the towels at the pool or on the beach. This place tries hard to make you comfortable and keep the prices down. I give it 4 stars as a three star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Photocopies IDs and Dirty Towels”
Reviews.Author: norcal1924
Reviews.Content: First, this hotel has a completely unacceptable practice of photocopying guests' driver's licenses upon check-in. This is unacceptable because it puts guests at substantial risk of identity theft and is a needless invasion of privacy. There are over 10 million cases of identity theft every year in this country, and most of it is committed by employees with access to sensitive personal information. A driver's license contains sensitive information such as date of birth, home address, and driver's license number, all of which can be used by hotel employees to commit identity theft or can be sold to others. It is a simple matter to look up a social security number using databases such as LexisNexis and Westlaw once a person has a name, date of birth, and DL number. DL numbers are routinely used in check fraud. Many websites resells this data. Moreoever, photocopies of identity documents can be used to open online bank accounts, request credit reports, change credit report information, and open credit card accounts. There is also no legitimate "need" for the hotel to have these photocopies. How long are they being stored for, under what security, and how is the hotel disposing of them? I would NEVER give a hotel or other similar business access to such information, and did not give this hotel my personal information. Second, 9 out of 10 towels were dirty with either dirt marks, stains, or hair. I don't know whether this hotel uses bleach when they wash the laundry, but they have a serious problem with cleaning the towels. Just hold the towels up to the light and you'll see what I'm talking about. Would not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice time for family”
Reviews.Author: Relepper
Reviews.Content: We live in Tampa and enjoy exploring the Florida beaches. We stayed twice at Hampton Inn Daytona Beach Shores last summer and had great time. The hotel is clean, breakfast is great and it's great having the pool right off the beach. The Saturday pool BBQ during the summer is a great perk. Sandy the GM and crew make it a lot of fun. We just booked our third visit for this weekend and are looking forward to it. There is also a large grocery store nearby to stock up on essentials when needed. (walking distance). Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Good times....”
Reviews.Author: ElcoT
Reviews.Content: We took a family vacation to this Hampton Inn during a very hot week in June. We chose it because it's an oceanfront hotel and we didn't expect to be nickeled and dimmed like resorts do. Parking is free, breakfast is free. The breakfast starts very early. Always has a hot entree, nice selection of juices, pastries, fruit, cereal, and the make your own waffle station. Always well maintained and staffed. The 24 hour coffee bar was very nice. Not necessary to make coffee in the room. Enjoyed the fresh baked cookies in the evening. The hotel lobby is updated, cool, and inviting. The room was a standard hotel room but nicely decorated with comfy beds. Our balcony overlooked the pool and the ocean. It was quite a view. We enjoyed the Saturday poolside picnic. We ate well and enjoyed the jello shots (they had non-alcoholic ones for the kids), the punch, and watching everyone sing karaoke. Overall, a very nice hotel with all the amenities our family enjoys. My only suggestions to help improve our next stay would be to have some shade at the pool. The heat became unbearable for us. Also, they should consider upgrading the plastic chairs on the balconies to something a little nicer and a little more comfortable. Finally, all hotel rooms should have flat panel TV's. Ours did not, but I'm sure it's only a matter of time before they get them in all the rooms. We plan to return to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean location”
Reviews.Author: bdib
Reviews.Content: We were here for the Atlantis shuttle launch and stayed for 3 days. Enjoyed our stay very much. Room was clean and comfortable (if you can't get ocean view, partial view is fine) Parking in the hotel lot is at a premium but staff helped find a spot. Great location directly on the beach. Beach towels offered in lobby. Free delicious breakfast included fresh waffles every day, 2 hot selections (eggs, gravy, biscuits, sausage etc), fresh fruit, cereal, muffins etc.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hampton”
Reviews.Author: Darke_Traveler
Reviews.Content: Had a ocean view room, like another review the sliding balcony door was "sticky", other wise no problems, building and rooms were clean, staff was good, we would stay there again. One "issue" that could be addressed is the lights over the ocean side parking and over the pool, very bright and shinging right at the building, other light designs would let guests look and see the ocean at night, no other buildings nearby had lights like that facing the building.

Reviews.Title: “This place is GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: pfricano
Reviews.Content: Oceanfront Daytona Beach with a nice, clean hotel, super service and even a Saturday cookout with karaoke. Life is good here!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa091
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful. The location is beautiful. Just a few stairs and then you are on the beach. The pool was nice. The breakfast was good. Clean and comfortable rooms. We would definitely come back to this Hampton!

Reviews.Title: “Best Hampton Inn in the Business”
Reviews.Author: travelinglj
Reviews.Content: The owner, staff and management make this an excellent and affordable place to stay in Daytona Shores. The hospitality was excellent and the activities on Saturday are second to no other Hampton Inn. I highly recommend a stay at this facility. The room was clean, the water pressure was great and the view was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Daytona Beach Shores!”
Reviews.Author: Sandy53449
Reviews.Content: This was our third year beach vacation at this Hampton Inn. Sandy and all of her staff are great. The rooms are clean, comfortable beds & pillows and nice free breakfast. The Saturday cook-out, DJ & singing are a fantastic time. It was the one day of our 9 days I did not go to the beach. We were having too much fun by the poo, listening to everyone sing, eating good burgers and watermelon! Sandy and her staff go way above during these cook-outs to make sure everyone has a wonderful time and we all do have fun. I always ask when we make our reservations...are you still doing the Saturday cook-outs? We will be back again in 2012!! My only suggestion is to make the pool area non-smoking.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC AS USUAL”
Reviews.Author: southernchef
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd Memorial Day weekend in a row here, and already cannot wait for next year. Sandy and her staff are all very knowledgable and very professional.Even the young man training at the desk when we arrived was outstanding. And again the pool party was tops. I do not have children but I was impressed with how family friendly it is here. My partner and I were made to feel as welcome as were all the other guests as many made comments when we all sat around the pool or were at breakfast. As for breakfast,the breakfast hostess was polite and kept everything clean and supplies full. The breakfast is standard Hampton fare maybe offer a few tropical or southern items other that biscuits and gravy once.The rooms were nice and clean,and the maids were very friendly too!

Reviews.Title: “a relaxing experiens”
Reviews.Author: Rafaelvl
Reviews.Content: The place is clean and organices, the staff verry polite, eaisy acses to the beach and a verry nice family enviroment ,,,,,, Thank you!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Just Awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: Jgonline
Reviews.Content: Stopped at this hotel for a rew days of R&R after 6 days at Disney World. What a GREAT choice. The staff was EXCELLENT. Greeted at checkin by Donna. She was super. Friendly, helpful and just super to deal with. She got our stay off to a great start. Especially after Disney and the rush hour drive from Orlando. The hotel was clean and the support staff all friendly and polite. Donna pointed us in the right direction for a great sea side dinner that evening too. An added bonus to the breakfast, was on Saturday they hosted a BBQ cookout poolside with Karaoke. That was a blast. General Manager Kathy, Maureen (Mo) and company really know how to treat the guests to a great time. I highly recommend this hotel to all travelers headed to Florida. We had a great ocean view room too. Only regret is we didn't stay longer. (Had to go back to work, UGH!) This is how a hotel should be run. THANKS for everything. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Trust all these reviews”
Reviews.Author: cedmonds
Reviews.Content: I really have nothing to add to the previous reviews, this place is great! The only unfortunate thing is there are really no good restaurants within walking distance so plan on driving if you want a good dining experience.

Reviews.Title: “The Best motel in Florida”
Reviews.Author: arkelly
Reviews.Content: have stayed at this motel numerous times and always will. Right on the beach, great oceanfront rooms and the staff is so great. I often judge other motels by the standards that this motel has and yet to find one that comes close to the friendliness of this staff

Reviews.Title: “The best weekend ever”
Reviews.Author: etorres27
Reviews.Content: We had the time of our lives, the host of the Memorial Day BBQ was the best of the best. I have never enjoyed a pool party like this one cudos to her and the team. All and all the hotel employees were also very helpful and the room was clean and very comfortable bed.

Reviews.Title: “What a gem”
Reviews.Author: scottinnova
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night, I used Hilton Honors points so I was expecting a standard room but was upgraded to an Ocean View which turned out to be much better then Ocean Front. We had shade for part of the day with great unobstructed views of the beach and ocean, we say on our balcony for coffee in the morning and wine in the evening. The hotel is on the main drag but far enough from the crowds to really feel like the beach was yours. Breakfast was typical Hampton, that said there was plenty of choices and the Waffles were great as usual. Great staff, very friendly and helpful and I would recommend this hotel to anyone. My rating of a five is based on Hampton Inn's I have been to ( over 50) , not compared to a true five-start hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Top of the line customer service”
Reviews.Author: dgipson
Reviews.Content: The moment we arrived, the concierge (front desk clerk) was friendly and helpful. After checking into our room, she called to check on us. The view was incredible and the room was impeccable. The next day we were greeted with a wonderful breakfast, beautiful sunrise, and warm cookies at the front desk. The pool was well kept and the beachfront access...unbelievable. Overall, the stay was wonderful. The Hampton Inn has always been a very nice hotel chain, but this experience exceeded all others. We were truly impressed and felt this hotel was an incredible value in quality, customer service, cleanliness, and location. I would definitely recommend this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Not A Bicycle Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaBikeGuy
Reviews.Content: If you are traveling with a bicycle AVOID this hotel. I was told nothing about they did not allow bikes in their rooms at check in. I even rolled my bike through the lobby several times and nobody said any thing. On my second day I went for a short ride and when I came back was told I had to have it locked up in their closet. I told them their was no way I was loosing sight of a $600 bike. Me and J.E. argued for several minuets till the elevator arrived and I went up to my room with my bike. My stay was now runed so I packed up and checked out demanding Hampton Inn !00% percent satisfaction guarantee which I did not get. I had to pay for the first night which was fine and was not charged for the second day. At least I paid for the time that I enjoyed myself there. They need to post a sign saying no bikes in the rooms. I WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN. Other than that it is a OK hotel. Typical Hampton Breakfast, Clean, On the beach. Nothing to wite home about. Parking is limited.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: Martysue
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night during our drive from NJ to Florida. It was the last day of our drive and the kids were excited to get out of the car and enjoy time on the beach. The beachfront location was terrific and its quiet since the hotel is south of Daytona Beach. We all had fun on the beach for hours and then spent time at the pool. The hotel is clean and our room was spacious and had a great view of the ocean. The hotel is a little old and the elevators are slow since there are only 2 in a eight story hotel.

Reviews.Title: “ONE OF THE BEST HOTELS I HAVE BEEN TO IN AWHILE!”
Reviews.Author: tangoray2
Reviews.Content: After our nightmare at the Mayan Inn...we were able to book rooms immediately, but the cost was much more, but well worth it! We had ocean front and my mom was so happy, the smile on her face was priceless, for being 70! The front desk people were so friendly and helpful. We walked into the room and the beds were to die for!!!!!!!!!!!! White comforters that were soft and comfy...3 pillows in each bed that were great....best 2 nites sleep in a long time. The breakfast in the morning was the bomb! You name it, they had it, biscuit and gravy, cheese omelets, scrambled eggs, cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruit, make your own waffles....it was great! They had beach chairs for their guest and towels. The only thing was the pool was not heated.The hotel is away from the hustle and bustle of Daytona Beach, but it you want it low key, this is the place to go.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Storm1of4
Reviews.Content: Fantastic! Great weekend getaway! Hotel was superb! Relaxing! Our ocean front room was very large and clean. Bathroom was nicely appointed. Exceeded all of our high expectations. Large balcony! Check in was smooth and quick. Very friendly front desk staff who took care of all our needs. Breakfast every morning was very nice incl. waffles, fresh fruit, freah bakery breads, juices, coffee/teas,ceral, eggs, potatoes and sausage served buffet style in nice dining room overlooking the pool and ocean. Great location too! We cant wait to go back to this lovely hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Awesome Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ddsa1965
Reviews.Content: Great service by all the staff-- made our Spring Break at Daytona Beach truly memorable.

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable, beautiful beach, great location”
Reviews.Author: Retired20
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights after coming from Disneyworld. We wanted a place to relax and enjoy the sun. We were very comfortable at this hotel. It is very clean and in a very good location. It is right on a beautiful beach and beach chairs are available at no charge. Our room was located on the side of the building but we were still able to view the ocean from the balcony. My only complaint would be the breakfast could use some inprovement. I like Hampton Inns because we travel by car and we have found them to be the most reliable and consistant. This is another Hampton Inn I was not dissappointed in.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: msflorida10
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a girlfriend weekend getaway. Arrived Friday and was allowed to check in around 1:00 instead of 4:00 since our room was ready. We checked out Saturday at 12:00 and stayed the rest of the day and used the hotel ammenities. The hotel is clean and quiet. We enjoyed the breakfast that was offered in the morning. Everyone that worked there was very helpful and pleasant. We really had a great time and have no complaints. The hotel stays within the standards of Hampton Inns hotel chain. We did eat at Barninacles a few miles south of the hotel AVOID this restaruant the food was over priced and not fit to eat. The restaurant was not very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Best by far!”
Reviews.Author: CT61
Reviews.Content: As a regular at this hotel I do not want to say too many nice things about it or maybe it will be full next time I want to stay.On a more serious note it has by far the best value on the beach. Great staff, impeccably clean, breakfast buffet and great views of the ocean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Sunrise”
Reviews.Author: ABFine
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for two nights in an oceanfront room, fourth floor. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The view from our balcony was fabulous. All hotel staff we encountered were friendly and helpful. The room was a bit pricey but for this location it wasn't totally out of line. One problem was a lack of beach chairs and umbrellas. There are some chairs available on a first come basis but no umbrellas. We were told that someone would come by with rentals but I was on the beach for hours and all I saw was the ice cream truck. Next time we'll bring our own. We were accompanied by a pod of dolphins on our morning walk. They seemed to be keeping pace with us and were fun to watch. The sunrise was spectacular. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: Bailey0810
Reviews.Content: We were in town for the cheer and dance nationals, so a number of the hotels were already booked. After looking at reviews online, I found the Hampton Inn. This is the first non-Marriott property we have stayed in for several years, and I was a little apprehensive. But this hotel was great! It was located within 5 miles of Ocean Center and the Boardwalk. So we were close, but not in the middle of all the craziness. The oceanfront room was perfect! The Daytona beach was so clean! Had to get used to the cars, though! The staff at the Hampton was so helpful and accommodating.
