I am fairly picky in terms of where we stay in terms of cleanliness, surroundings, convenience, etc. and we will definitely return to the Hampton the next time we're in Daytona!

Reviews.Title: “Don't Understand the Rave Reviews?”
Reviews.Author: d75angel
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel for one night at appx $200. Based on the TA reviews I thought it might be worth it. Wrong. Staff was friendly and responsive but the hotel is in need of renovation. One of the two Elevators did not work. All the Parking Lot lights were out which was concerning bc the rear of the bldg (parking lot, pool and rear entrance) was extremely dark. Rooms were ok but worn and old. If in the area again, I would stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Caring, Clean, Great Location, Outstanding Staff”
Reviews.Author: melodyebay
Reviews.Content: Oceanfront property with a wonderful and caring staff. Everyone that I came in contact with there inquired how my trip was going and if there was anything else they could do for me. I stayed with my 3 kids and everyone was great. From the time I stepped in until I left I felt catered to. The rooms were clean and comfortable with lots of room. Being an oceanfront property it was kept clean from sand. The views from the side blaconies were phenomenal. Elevators were not slow as some are. The morning breakfast was as other Hampton Inns, very nice. If travelling with children or just adults, this place is on the top of my list - and we stay at hotels 30 or so nights a year.

Reviews.Title: “Very good, but a few problems”
Reviews.Author: ohioman_11
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for three nights while viisting friends in Daytona Beach. The hotel was in a great location with a perfect view of the ocean. Everything was very clean and well maintained. We had a problem with the internet not working in our room. We had to go to the lounge for the internet to work. There were others there that had the same problem. When we inquired at the desk about the connection, they suggested it was our computer and gave us a wireless kit that did not work either. In addition we also found the two queen bed room to be cramped and the breakfast to be rather ordinary. Overall, I would rate this hotel as very good and would probably stay ther again.

Reviews.Title: “hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: gorej
Reviews.Content: seeing hotel after hotel I wondered what awaited me at the Hampton Inn Daytona Shores. From the minute I walked in I was treated llike I was a long time highly valued customer (this was my first visit). The room, overlooking the ocean was immaculate, comfortable and modern. Everythign I needed (internet, exta towels ironing board) was all there. Breakfast was perfect. What stike me the most was how clean no spotless the hotel was and how warm freindly and genuine the people who work there were. There is absolutley no quesitn I would stay there again and recommend it to all

Reviews.Title: “The Perfect Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: Mom6118
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hampton. The oceanfront room with balcony, the pristine beach, the proximity to nature areas and tourist attractions, all combined to make it a very enjoyable weekend. I would change nothing about the hotel or its staff. Great job!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Beach Front, Very Clean!!”
Reviews.Author: IPVW
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for a weekend getaway. Received excellent service from everyone. Hotel was very clean and rooms are large. Loved the cookies at night for my little one. Excellent and tasty breakfast. The hotel has a great view; perfect for sitting by the pool for breakfast or afternoon relaxation!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with beachfront, breakfast, comfort and awesome service.”
Reviews.Author: MAG3386
Reviews.Content: Hotel was PERFECT in every way. Great beachfront location, big pool, very good breakfasts, clean and comfortable rooms, helpful and friendly staff, late day cookies, computer available for guests, easy access and reasonably priced. Who could ask for more? I'll definitely stay there again. Best hotel I've found in Daytona Beach area .

Reviews.Title: “Easy to Review”
Reviews.Author: sudbury26
Reviews.Content: Who wouldn't want a hotel that's right on the beach at a reasonable price, has clean comfortable rooms with an ocean view, provides a great breakfast, and serves warm cookies at the end of the day? This was my third stay and each time the staff has been helpful and the experience has been consistently great.

Reviews.Title: “The cleanist, friendliest hotel I've stayed at”
Reviews.Author: KBG609
Reviews.Content: This property is the cleanist hotel I've stayed at and what a view!! The entire staff, from the General Manager (Sandy) to all the front desk staff, the housekkeepers, maintenance team, and the breakfast people are only interested in making my stay a first class experience. This was my 4th stay & I'm sure I will be making many more.

Reviews.Title: “Actually did not stay, but had great customer service experience”
Reviews.Author: devogrrrrl
Reviews.Content: I booked a stay recently using Hilton Honors award points and due to illness had to cancel after the cancellation deadline had passed. A Hilton Honors rep called the hotel and asked the hotel to waive the deadline - and they did! I really appreciated this being done as they were not required contractually to do this. When I am in this area next time, I will be sure to give them my business.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn Oceanfront is the place to stay in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: Wimpy46
Reviews.Content: My friends and I stayed at this hotel as we enjoyed a Florida vacation over the Christmas holidays. What a great choice we made! We were greeted by a friendly staff and enjoyed great amenitites. The breakfast each day was well-prepared and the cookies each evening were icing on the cake! Clean rooms...great pool area....convenient location! Will stay there again for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, wonderful stay.”
Reviews.Author: msj31
Reviews.Content: The staff at the Hampton Inn was just wonderful. They are helpful, professional and greet you with a smile. The night we checked in DeAnn was on the desk, we were tired for a long drive and she just made everything easy and was so welcoming. The rooms are old but very clean and the ocean view makes up for the lack of ammenties. We enjoyed our stay and will be coming back.

Reviews.Title: “My Home at the Beach”
Reviews.Author: FloridaTravlinMan
Reviews.Content: This hotel is my choice in Daytona Beach. The front desk staff is friendly, professional, and goes out of their way to make your stay completely satisfying. Great location and a nice breakfast too!

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: deniseiowa
Reviews.Content: great stayhere-I thought it was a bit expensive, but overall was great!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: canadianbeagleNY
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of Hampton Inn's because they are consistently clean, provide good service, have no hidden charges (free internet, free parking, free breakfast) and are generally a great value. While I personally don't feel this is THE BEST Hampton Inn in the US (personal preference: this one has the air of a big Hilton rather than the old worlde charm of most Hampton's), I must say it's unusual in that this hotel is on prime real estate - a beautiful white sand beach and hotel rooms w/ balconies that overlook the ocean. Free cookies to boot!

Reviews.Title: “Great short stay!”
Reviews.Author: TennesseeJustme
Reviews.Content: We stayed 1 night here while on our way recently to Orlando/ Disney World. The motel is nice, has a huge outdoor pool, hot tub was nice, short walk to beach. Our room had a private balcony over looking the ocean (nice) Had 2 outdoor chairs and small table on balcony. Beds slept real good. We were on 5TH floor, heard little noise from other rooms and from outside. Motel serves free breakfast, it was good, had basic breakfast stuff (scrambled eggs, bacon, cereal, muffins, bagels, etc.) Granddaughters loved watching the sun rise the next morning and playing in the cold ocean water before we ate breakfast. Once the sun was up it didn't take long for water to warm up. The area this motel is in seems to be the quieter side of the town.

Reviews.Title: “Came for the value, will return for the whole package!”
Reviews.Author: spon72
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn because it was close to our old stomping grounds. We had priced some of the Mom and Pop motels and for less than $10 more we got much more. We had an ocean front room with a king size bed. Our only complaint is that the pillows were very soft, and for us they were hard to sleep on. That being said, the rooms and the property were spotless. We were arriving the day Biketoberfest ended, and there were no signs of it. The pool was great, there were so many lounge chairs, also poolside tables with umbrellas. The hotel offers beach toys for kids and beach chairs for everyone. The breakfast and attendants were wonderful. Cookies in the evening too. Ponce Inlet is just a couple miles South, Daytona Beach is North. The hotel is conveniently located to restaurants and the local Publix grocery store. I can't say enough about the staff and we are so glad that we picked this hotel. We will stay there again and recommend it to our friends!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: allaboutbeaches1010
Reviews.Content: My husband and I as well as family and friends stayed at this hotel for our wedding in Ponce Inlet based on advice from a friend's co-worker . We were not disappointed! The service we received while staying was the best service I have experienced at ANY hotel. From housekeeping to the General Manager we could not have asked for more. The only thing I did not rate excellent was the rooms itself, our oceanfront balcony door was hard to open and the carpet was clean but older. Overall the rooms were nice and clean. We did have an issue with our debit card having a hold on it. It was supposed to clear within 2-3 business days, however it was right at a week and did not clear. We called and talked to the General Manager and she called our bank and handled it herself that day. The hotel provides a free breakfast, beach chairs, towels and sand toys for the kids. The rooms also have a microwave and refrigerator. The price is comparable to other hotels in the area but some do not provide the free breakfast, parking, or the chairs and sand toys. We will definately return!

Reviews.Title: “This is the "BEST" Hampton Inn in the United States.”
Reviews.Author: Constance33
Reviews.Content: Arrived in Daytona Beach on October 03, 2010, for a much needed vacation, only to find the place I booked on line was a dump. Dirty, bugs, old, stained towels, etc. Spent one night. Called the Hampton Inn, and spoke with John. Arrived at the Inn on October 04, 2010. John was just as nice as he was on the phone. What a wonderful desk clerk crew. He assured me we would be very happy with the Inn. Happy was not the word to describe how we felt when we arrived. From the clerks, housekeeping, to the wonderful breakfast staff, everyone was professional and helpful. The room was very clean. The location of the Inn is perfect. Thank you, for a great vacation.....Connie from Delaware.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: IPJSIllinois
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton for nights after a 5 night cruise. I chose this hotel as I stayed here several years ago, also due to the location as Daytona Beach Shores is quieter. The manager was checking people in as she indicated that some staff for the day shift were no longer available. She did acknowledge us and a few other folks who were waiting to check in. We had a room on the 5th floor in the corner facing the ocean. Our room was very clean and well kept up. The room had a nice size fridge and microwave with a small coffee pot in the bathroom. 2 plastic chairs on the balconey. Pool water was a bit cold but some people didn't mind it . We were there for a Thursday and Friday night and the hotel and beach was quiet. Breakfast was good with a good variety. The hot foods besides the waffles was scramble eggs and biscuits and gravy on Friday morn and eggs and sausage pattys on Saturday morn. All public areas including the bathrooms were clean and neat. Parking lot is a bit small but was no problem as the hotel wasn't full. OVer all a great stay and will stay here again on my next stay to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place”
Reviews.Author: grandma053
Reviews.Content: We traveled with a young grandson. He was never really "on vacation" before. He enjoyed the experience. The place was very clean, neat and the staff was courteous, and very friendly. I have family near-by and they visited us on the beach. We especially liked the beach boxes full of extra chairs and toys for the guests to use on the beach. What a great idea!! Breakfasts were full of variety, and tasty. We will be staying again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Hotel, Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: k8marcelino
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough great things about this hotel. The staff here is so friendly, especially with my hyper little ones. Very accomidating. Clean rooms, delicious breakfast (especially the waffles), if you forgot something they have it. The pool is immaculate and steps from the ocean. Sandy is one of the nicest people you'll meet and a terrific manager. She has a wonderful team beside her. I'll give 5 and a half out of 5 stars!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: gav1967
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights, after having 11 nights in Orlando. The hotel overlooks the beach and you can walk onto the sands at your leisure. However, the hotel was fully booked when we stayed, as Labor day was the Monday after the Friday when we checked in. Americans celebrate this weekend as offically the end of summer I think, and as it was the weekend of a National holiday a number of people chose to spend time at the hotel. The rooms are ok and the staff were always friendly and helpful. The cookies were excellent. Hampton runs a cookout each Saturday during the summer and this is free to hotle guests. Basically it is a barbecue which offers cheeseburgers, burgers and hotdogs together with free beer and soft drinks. One thing that I did find very annoying was that all the sun loungers were being reserved for this event by the placing of towels. They were all taken at 8.00am although nobody was round the pool. The hotel should be responsible and take them off. The cookout was only scheduled for 12.00!!! A number of people over indulged on drink. Our room had an open lobby and as such people were smoking and talking loudly. They had obviously been drinking. The car park is a bit cramped, and the breakfast area is on the small side, but I suppose it was very busy when we stayed.

Reviews.Title: “Rude front desk staff”
Reviews.Author: Jjanet46
Reviews.Content: We arrived around 3 pm on Saturday afternoon of Labor Day weekend. There were no parking spaces at all. The woman at the front desk said "Well, it's Labor Day weekend, what do you expect?" Then she asked to see a photo id. When I handed it to her,she disappeared into a back room. SEE a photo id is not the same thing as making a copy of your drivers license. When she returned I told her I did not want a copy of my license made. She said she didn't copy it, but I could see the photocopy in her hand! She outright lied to me! When I called her on it, she reluctantly gave it to me. Haven't they ever heard of identity theft? She gave us wristbands for the free BBQ. We dropped our things in our room and went down to the pool. There was no food at all. Zip. Nada. Zero. There was soda and water. That's it. I had chosen this hotel partially based on the free BBQ because after a long drive, we might not want to go out to eat. But we had to anyway because they didn't plan enough food for Labor Day. There was a really old guy singing really bad kareoke (was he the DJ?) really really loud. My kids and I escaped to the beach and the ocean. The pool was nice, the beach was great, the room was fine, the breakfast was just okay. I probably will stay somewhere else on our way to Disney next year.

Reviews.Title: “Front Desk Staff Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: sssunshine
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to Daytona Beach in over 10 years. After reading the reviews here, I didn't think twice about staying at this Hampton Inn. I reserved a King room oceanfront, preferably on a high floor. When I arrived and was told my room was on the 4th floor (actually 3 floors up), I asked if there was room available on a higher floor. The young man (I think his name was John, but I'm not sure, I checked in on Thursday, August 26th and checked out Sunday, August 29th), told me nothing was available. I asked if he was sure and he told me there is only one King room oceanfront per floor and the upper floors were already booked (I learned later that he was not telling the truth - there's at least one other King room oceanfront on each floor). Then, the other guy at the front desk whose name I did not get said that the hotel "caters to families." Well, just shoot me for being single!!!! The purpose of my trip, which I realize they didn't know, was to get some "me" time following the demise of my marriage, so imagine being told by the hotel staff where you are going to relax and recover that the hotel caters to families. Of course, they did not know my heartache, but still!!!! Okay, after getting to my room which was a corner room (401), I found ants in the bathroom. After killing the 5th ant that I saw, thankfully, I did not see any more in the bathroom for the rest of my stay. I told the person at the front desk about the ants and he told me that the guy who does their monthly pest spraying was just leaving the hotel. Inspite of the insensitivity of the front desk staff and the ants, I managed to have a wonderful time. I LOVE the beach at Daytona Beach. I was determined to not let the front desk staff ruin my stay. The hotel turned out to be really nice. The location right on the beach was just what I had hoped for and needed.The breakfast was plentiful and filling. I did not go to the free Saturday meal at the pool because I stay away from hot dogs and burgers, but it looked like people were enjoying themselves. My King room was nice and large. It had a microwave and small refridgerator which was nice. Would I stay here, again? NO!!!!! I'd rather stay at a hotel that caters to ALL their guests whether they are single or with a family. Maybe the front desk staff should get some sensitivity training.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: DelandBklvr
Reviews.Content: My husband and I travel 30 miles from home to get away from it all at this Hampton. The staff is so accomodating and attentive. The rooms are emmaculate. The breakfast is delicious! During the summer months Sandy and her staff put on the best family- friendly beach party in town every Saturday afternoon. Food ,drinks, games...all for the price of your room! The whole experience is so relaxing...why drive farther when you can have it all so close to home!

Reviews.Title: “Wow !”
Reviews.Author: secretstar
Reviews.Content: If you want to have a great stay and meet great people, This is the place. The staff is friendly and bend over backwards to make your stay all you expect it to be. From the free breakfast to the barbque by the pool there is always something going on. At night when things cool down you can take a walk on the beach or watch the sunset from your balcony. Give it a try your sure to be back..

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: sheyden
Reviews.Content: My husband and I couldn't have been happier with our stay. The staff made you feel like family and they sure know how to throw a great Saturday afternoon pool party! The free breakfast was plentiful and the beachfront rooms clean and comfortable. Only wish we could have stayed longer!

Reviews.Title: “Girls weekend rocked at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: samsoncat
Reviews.Content: Just spent a fantastic 2 nights, and this hotel rally know how to treat their guests! Free hot breakfast (loved the eggs & ham) hot cookies at night that taste like they're from Grandma's, and the Saturday cookout!!! Free hamburgers, dogs, sodas, beer and jello shots along with great entertainment! All ages got involved and had a blast. Who could ask for anything more? Can't wait to go back. One of the runaway gals

Reviews.Title: “A Beachfront Home away from Home ... This Hotel Has it ALL!!!”
Reviews.Author: SJNoodles
Reviews.Content: I am a regular business traveler to various locations and a frequent vacationer to the Daytona Beach area ... I have never felt so at home at any other hotel as I do at this Hampton Inn location. The staff is beyond friendly and accomodating ... and quite stealthy :o) All of a sudden the breakfast bar is replenished, cookies are baked, towels are replenished and there is no sign of activity at the pool from the day before. This Hampton has it all!! A large pool, nice hot tub, just a step away from the beach, a nice breakfast and on Saturdays in the summer a very cool pool party!!!! The staff always has a smile and do all they can to make your stay enjoyable - it feels like I am staying at a relative's house!! The hotel is in a great Daytona Beach location - many activities are close by ... yet far enough away that it is easy to get a great comfy night's sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Florida!”
Reviews.Author: Foodlover82
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this hotel & everything that comes with it! You get a delicious breakfast in the morning, a pool party with drinks & food on Saturdays in the summer, and fresh baked cookies at night. For what you pay, you get so much more than you would anywhere else. Only recommedation would to bring you own pillow:)

Reviews.Title: “Great Place on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: BhamBuddy
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Hampton for a week while on business in Daytona Beach. This is a beach hotel, so it is not a "spotless" as a Hampton in a city location, but I found it in very good shape. The room was nice- bed and pillows were comfortable, bathroom was clean, and it was nice to be able to sit on the balcony and see the ocean. Breakfast was very good each morning and there were plenty of cookies at the front desk each night. The pool was nice and the beach is right below it. The wireless internet worked very well. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this Hampton Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Does what it says on the tin!”
Reviews.Author: BackPackandGo
Reviews.Content: Like other reviewers before me, I don't understand why some people posted negative comments about this hotel. I travelled on my own from England and I based my choice of this hotel partially on Trip Advisor reviews and I was NOT disappointed! Fantastic location on the beach! I had an oceanfront room on the 8th floor which was large by British standards and was surprisingly quiet which I appreciated. I have nothing bad to say about this hotel, only good! I didn't realise I had chosen the quieter end of Daytona but was grateful that I had after seeing 'downtown' and the Hilton which was the other hotel I was considering. I could see nothing wrong with the lobby, it was perfectly fine and the whole hotel was very clean, quite a feat considering the amount of sand we brought in! Any shop I needed was with 5 - 10 mins walk and not only was there public transport but it was easy to use. The staff were excellent and all genuinely enjoyed their job. I talked to staff from maids to the engineer. The Reception staff are excellent and I caught Kyle at his best, frequently. He is a real asset to this hotel and was always friendly and helpful when I had a question. The 24 hour tea and coffee station was much appreciated, especially the tea! and the fruit and cookies at Reception as well. I wondered what the big deal about the cookies was, until I tried them, Awesome! The breakfast on the run was much appreciated at 5 am when I checked out. The room price was very reasonable considering the location and it was cheaper than my Heathrow Airport hotel! What more can I say, if you are looking for a great hotel in Daytona, look no further!! I only wish I was there now and hope to visit again one day!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: luvsdaytona
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best vacations to Daytona Beach we've ever had. We had always stayed in North Daytona , but decided to try South Daytona this year. When we arrived we couldn't have been happier with our rooms, they were spotless. We had 2 oceanfront rooms,1 smoking & 1 non-smoking. The hotel is beautiful and very well maintained. The staff was so friendly and we talked to a lot of other guests that were so nice. Our little boy made so many friends with other guests. The cookout was great on Saturday. The breakfast area was always great and very clean no matter how many guests were down there. There really isn't anything that I could say negative about this hotel. Can't wait to plan our next vacation there. We'll definitely be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “This Hampton Inn is Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Sanders-Mississauga
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at a lot of Hamptons and this one stands out above the rest. Sandy and her team go out of their way to make sure you feel like your at home away from home. The hotel is very clean and well kept and the service is second to none.I would strongly recommend this hotel. On our most recent trip, we had a problem with the brakes on our van 2000km from home and Sandy called a local garage she knew to book us a quick appointment and make sure we were taken care of fairly. Now that is service!

Reviews.Title: “The summer Saturday Cookout was awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: dsteber
Reviews.Content: Not sure how people gave this hotel a bad review. The price was VERY fair. The room was fine. I think it could been a little cooler, but it was Ocean Front on the top floor. Sandy was awesome. I need to give her my recipe for the jello shots that she made for the Saturday cook-out, but hers worked out just fine!!!! Directly on the beach, breakfast was fine. I mean, it's free!!! It's not IHOP. I thought it was great!! If you are hard to please, then find a Ritz. This will be our choice when we go back. Sandy won't be able to walk when she has my jello shots!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Time and Family fun!”
Reviews.Author: citra210
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at the hampton, the staff was great! Everyone was helpful and very nice. Sandy the General Manager was very friendly and wanted to be sure we had a good time, She took the time to stop and speak to everyone, brought out popcycles in the afternoon for everyone. Saturday she had pool party that was awsome. We all sang Kareoke, had Food and drinks and a lot of fun! Thanks for the great time!

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hampton Inn we have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Bonk56
Reviews.Content: This property does not live up to the standard we have come to expect from Hampton Inn. The lobby area is older and not sparkling clean. The room was better than the lobby which was a pleasant surprise, though. For an ocean front room, it was not as run down as many we have seen. We were thankful for that. The breakfast left a lot to be desired, as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great family stay, wonderful staff.”
Reviews.Author: john7690
Reviews.Content: This was our third stay at the Hampton Inn in Daytona Beach Shores. The location is great, right on the beach within 5 minutes of the Daytona boardwalk, and 10 minutes of Ponce Inlet. The hotel is kept spotlessly clean with the usual amenities that Hampton Inns provide, including a free hot breakfast buffet in the morning from 6:30 to 10:00 and warm fresh cookies in the evening after 7:30. They also have complimentary popcicles for the kids, and on Saturday afternoons there is a pool-side cook-out and karioke with a DJ and some of the best burgers and hot dogs around, along with soft drinks for the kids and rum punch for the parents. Outstanding. The swimming pool is large, with a 3' shallow end and 5' deep end. No diving board or kiddie pool, but plenty of relaxation and fun for everyone. The hotel provides pool and beach toys, and folding beach chairs in storage lockers at the pool, just grab what you want and go play. Our kids (5 and 2) had as much fun at the pool as on the beach, and it's a great way to unwind after a day in the surf. There is also a small hot tub, but with the temperature in the 90s and the pool feeling like bath water already I couldn't imagine hopping into the hot tub. Maybe in November. The beach is just a few steps below the pool deck, down the stairs and you're on the beautiful white powder sand that Daytona is famous for. The hotel itself is not a new building, and from the front could easily be passed by as nothing special, but a closer look tells a different story. The design is "L" shaped, with most of the rooms ocean-front. The rest have an great ocean view to the left and a beautiful view of the Halifax river to the right. There is ample free parking on site and across the street. We never had to park across the street, but it's a short walk. The rooms are very nice, kept in good condition and very clean. Everything works, everything is comfortable. There is an in-room safe, free WiFi, a dorm-size refrigerator and microwave oven, which are wonderful for quick meals in the room when the kids are more ready for a nap than lunch. I could only find one negative to the room and that is the airconditioner, which is a wall unit, common to many hotels. The ones here are new and in good condition, but like all of their kind can be a bit loud. I usually set the fan to run at low speed on this type of A/C unit at night to make it easy to sleep, but these do not have that option, and cycle on and off. It didn't keep me from sleeping, but I'd have preferred a steady fan at night. There is little more I can say about the hotel except that it is a credit to Sandy, Donna, and the entire staff who truly love what they do and do an outstanding job, often going out of their way to care for their guests. It's a great feeling to be recognized and welcomed back after a 2 year hiatus due to our newest being born. We already look forward to coming back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Old Fashioned Value with Extras”
Reviews.Author: Kipkay
Reviews.Content: We arrived to check-in on Friday and met the manager, Sandy, who was very friendly and made sure to let us know about the Saturday festivities. Our room was a double Queen Oceanview on the 6th floor. Parking is free. While it is about 5 miles from the main tourist attractions on Daytona Beach, this hotel is still right smack on the beach and likely has a very mixed clientele, especially during spring break, I expected in to be a bit rough at the edges. No big deal. Our room was perfect for what we had planned...a lazy weekend at the beach, pool and wherever else we would rest and relax. The most important things were there...a clean bathroom, wonderful Hilton style comfy beds and a balcony overlooking the beach and pool. We were also glad to see the larger sized mini-fridge which made room for some of our own goodies. They still have older TV's that work fine with no extra cost movie frills. Who wants to stay in the room and watch movies? There's free HBO so that should be fine for everyone. The Saturday party at the pool was fun and entertaining with free burgers, hot dogs and drinks. Later there was Karaoke, hula-hoop contest, JELL-O shots and watermelon. This pool party happens from Memorial Day to Labor Day. There is a free breakfast every morning with basic items although we ventured out for breakfast each day. There is free wireless internet which worked fine. There isn't really a 'business center' but there is a free computer you can use in the lobby area. Since there is no restaurant on site there is no room service which we very rarely use anyway. The only downsides to our stay was the coffee in our room. Not sure the brand but it was pretty awful so I went downstairs and got us coffee. Also, the elevators are pretty slow so don't be in a hurry to go up or down. Both are very minor criticisms. We received a free newspaper every day and there is fruit and fresh cookies in the lobby on ocassion. We would definitely come back here in a heart beat!

Reviews.Title: “Loved It, will be back”
Reviews.Author: PlayHard05
Reviews.Content: The hotel experience was wonderful. I would highly recommend staying at this hotel. My wife and I had an ocean front view and it was worth it. We stayed for five days and we were very pleased: the room is spacious and clean, the bed was very comfortable, the bathrooms are spacious and clean. During I time there were rented a scooter from rent-a-scooter. That was a lot of fun and their prices are reasonable. We also visited the Ponce Inlet, which is right down the street from the hotel, and climbed the lighthouse - be ready for a workout. The only con, if you can call it a con, is that parking on the premises is at a premium. However, they do have parking right across the street. Overall the hotel is great, you have beach access, the complimentary breakfast was very good, on Saturdays they have a cookout for residents and they bake fresh cookies every night. Next year, Me and my wife are going to take the kids.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: tonihorsley
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Daytona. The hotel was fantastic! Very clean, the staff was great and amenities were awesome!! First floor room with 2 queen beds and sleeper sofa. Just a few steps to the dining room and pool. From the pool, just step down the stairs and you were on the beach. Free breakfast every morning and cookies for a snack at night. We will definately come back here. Wouldn't even try another hotel.

Reviews.Title: “friendliness great mattresses great sleep!”
Reviews.Author: hudson43
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Hampton Inn in Daytona Shores Fl. last week and I would like to share our experience. The hotel was extremely well run, very clean and a very hospitable feel. Primarily due to the excellent job the manager Sandy executes. We had our daughter and two teenagers with us for over a week and at no time did the kids get restless. They loved the fresh baked cookies every evening, the variety of breakfast goodies every morning, and in particular, the wonderful barbecue and karoke on Saturday. It was a lovely way to meet the other guests and staff , very entertaining, and lots of fun. We will definitely be back! Dee Hudson

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Emmie626
Reviews.Content: Everything from the hospitality, cleanliness, friendly staff, and convenience helped to make our vacation stay so memorable and enjoyable. The breakfast was convenient and delicious. The karaoke party on Saturday was so fun and above and beyond what we would expect from the hotel staff. Thanks to all the Hampton Inn staff that helped make our stay so great!

Reviews.Title: “A most satisfying hotel”
Reviews.Author: 40yrsooner
Reviews.Content: For friendliness, cleanliness, and location you won't find a better place. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome. The rooms, pool area, elevators, and breakfast area are always clean. I would rate my wife and I as very picky about our choice of hotels and after staying here several times we wouldn't consider staying anywhere else. If it is a nice relaxing vacation you are looking for this is the place.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME!!!”
Reviews.Author: studyrbg
Reviews.Content: Even though this is a large hotel Sandy, the GM and her staff treat you like family. This was our second stay and I have added this hotel to my favorites and will stay there many more times. I can't figure out why AAA only gives them 3 stars. I have been around the world and this place should get at least 4. I also want to give a shout out to Mark and his crew for the Saturday Karaoke. It was an awesome time!

Reviews.Title: “unlike all the other Hamptons I've stayed at... and not in a good way”
Reviews.Author: Percyb
Reviews.Content: I am so surprised this was rated so high. There was a huge black hair in our bed the first day we got there which was okay because I realize maybe it was just an oversight and I was hoping that it wasn't because they didn't even bother to change the sheets but we soon found out that housekeeping is a joke here; they won't change your sheets unless you specifically ask. That is unlike other beachfront Hampton Inns I have stayed at that change the sheets daily because they have the foresight to realize that at the beach you tend to get sand in the bed. The staff acts like everything is a hassle; my spouse and I asked if we could extend our stay and the person at the front desk acted exceptionally annoyed at my request and told me he was too busy for me to pay now and asked that I pay later. I told him I was leaving very early in the morning and needed to pay then and he unhappily complied. The pool was very nice and they brought popsicles out to the pool occasionally for the guests during the heat of the day which was very nice and our bed was very comfortable. I am generally a faithful Hampton customer, but once you stay at the Hampton Inn at Myrtle Beach and then come to this Hampton expecting the same quality and value you will be disappointed with your stay-- it is like two different companies.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful week with wonderful people!”
Reviews.Author: mstymac
Reviews.Content: Our first stay at this Hampton Inn and what a blast we had! Friendly staff...and when I say friendly, I mean friendly like family. We felt at home the moment we walked through the double doors. Clean! Clean! Clean! The service was exceptional from the front desk staff to housekeeping. (Thank you Adrien!) My son loved the baked treats every evening and the Saturday cookout was an awesome plus. My daughter conquered her stage fright that afternoon when she sang TWO karaoke songs. The fun was contagious. What a great way to get to know your temporary neighbors. The only thing that could make it better would be a couple of shade trees beside the pool. We really enjoyed our stay. Thanks Sandy for a great time. You are the hostess with the mostest girl! We will see you next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: bbarkholz
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a romantic get-away a few months back and would recommend it without a doubt. Absolutely an amazing hotel...great service, great location, great value!

Reviews.Title: “We will be back”
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff. Sandy, fun and knows her hotel, guest and staff. Kyle, thanks for holding cookies for the granddaughter. Shawn, up early, works like a bee and so friendly. This was truley on of my best stays anywhere ever, and I've traveled alot. Jan - Longwood, Florida

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, best in the area”
Reviews.Author: Funtimes123
Reviews.Content: Pros: Cookout on the pool deck with food/drinks/dj. Beautiful view from oceanside/poolside. Great/large pool area with hot tub. 2 elevators. Lobby/dining area very clean. Typically there is water and sand tracked in--not here. Always clean. Cons: Pillows/beds not typical quality of Hampton. Beds were lumpy, no support. Pillows were uncomfortable. Fishy odor in room about mid week caused by fridge---it was cleaned and sprayed upon request and no further problems. Room was not cleaned very well during stay. Bathtub had to be rinsed before giving toddler bath. Same number of towels were not always left so sometimes we did not have enough. Overall very good stay. Nice area outside of Daytona. Close driving distance to all local shopping/restaurants/attractions of Daytona. I would not stay in Daytona Beach, but would stay in Daytona Beach Shores again, at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service and pleasant atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: couzen
Reviews.Content: I have been a Hilton Diamond member for years and this is the best Hampton Inn I have stayed in with some of the most friendly and helpful staff. I arrived early and they were able to accommodate an early check in. I then find out they are having a cookout by the pool for hotel guests. I was given passes for the cookout even though it would have ended around my scheduled check in time. The cookout was fun with free food and drinks. A DJ and the karaoke kept everyone entertained. The view from the balcony connected to my room was fantastic. We were on the side of the hotel and able to see the ocean as well as the river. The only negative I can think of is the elevator was always busy which made a small wait to get to our room.

Reviews.Title: “Mgmt. was rude and disrespectful to my family who lived in town.”
Reviews.Author: brent62
Reviews.Content: There was a woman mgr. who refused a 9 yr old girl and her 30 yr old uncle to swim with us while on vacation. We come here every yr. with other hotels and that would never be an issue. That was the whole reason why we stay in hotels and not with them so that we can all enjoy the pool and hotel together. This lady ran this pool party they had and wouldn't even give them the time of day to listen..... she made up her mind about my family immediately and would not even consider she might be wrong. We ended up going back to there house in Daytona and cooking out. No pool.... No beach.... and No hotel... However it was a great day after that little incident. When has anyone heard of a hotel that you are only allowed visitors to your room and no where else? THATS CRAZY! Oddly enough I called the next day and I was told by someone else that I can swim with my family and that she was just being rude. So that mgr who knows exactly who she is needs to maybe consider taking some customer service classes or maybe even some anger mgmt because she is undoubtably the rudest person in customer service i have ever encountered. Other than that the hotel was actually pretty nice, however they need a more lively and respectful person to run those events. She wasnt exactly FUN.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to Stay on Daytona Beach!”
Reviews.Author: beachgoer34438
Reviews.Content: When we go to Daytona for either business or pleasure we always stay here, the hotel is right on the beach, it is very clean and the staff is very friendly, I always recommend this hotel to everyone heading this way.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Daytona Beach.”
Reviews.Author: Kresl
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is great. The staff is wonderful. The rooms are clean and big. The free breakfast was really good: lots to choose from and different every day. The pool was very nice (when we needed a break from the sand and salt water). It is located right on the beach. It is not in downtown Daytona Beach, so it is quiet. But it isn't far from restaurants and activities. It is easy to find. A really great hotel that made it easier to enjoy our vacation.

Reviews.Title: “This is the best place in Daytona Beach to stay.”
Reviews.Author: jwillis2028
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stay at this hotel all the time and it's the best Sandy, the manager and her staff do everything to make sure you have a great time,and during the summer they have a cook-out every Saturday with music and fun things to do for the whole family.Can't wait to go back with the grandkids.

Reviews.Title: “Great beachfront hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: tslayman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for a nice beach getaway. This hotel is affordable but offers some great amenities. The staff were accomodating. It is further down from the boardwalk and in a nice quiet area. We were very pleased with everything about our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Superb location,staff”
Reviews.Author: southernchef
Reviews.Content: This was a great stay.The location is directly on the ocean, with the pool overlooking the beach. We stayed Memorial Day weekend. They had a cookoutat the pool on Saturday which was fun with burgers,hotdogs,chips, beer,sodas, and a great rum punch. There was kareoke and a dj.it was a very family friendly gathering. The hotel was clean, beach towels are provided for the guests.breakfast was typical Hampton fare.Staff was helpful with dining recommendations.Only drawback is the vendors for beach chairs/umbrellas. Bring money they cost $30.00 a day to rent and icecream man truck on the beach was $4.00 for any item. Overall great stay and will be back in September1

Reviews.Title: “All the comforts of home for laided-back fun at the beach”
Reviews.Author: bannerboss
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a comfortable informal and inviting feel to it that is great for families to unwind at. We were impressed with how well run and clean everything was. Better than average breakfast buffet and a no cost barbecue on Saturday afternoons during the summer with pool side karaoke adding to the festivities. Most rooms have a private balcony with great views, a refrigerator, and a microwave.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: LindseyFaith
Reviews.Content: This hotel was fantastic. I have to say that the best part was the "Super Saturday" they put on. Free food, free drinks, karaoke, and a nice cool swimming pool on a hot day can't be beat. The staff would have to be the friendliest I've met, and it didn't hurt that the lobby smelled like cookies. I would definately recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect get away stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kinneyvacations
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at this hotel and we would definitely stay there again. Right on the beach, the waves humming, and beautiful sunrises. The staff was very friendly, and helpful with information, and places to go. Our room was great, clean, and when we chose to not have service they would call and make sure we were ok, and for sure didn't need anything. The breakfasts were delicious and fresh and the area was maintained continuously. The pool, pool area, even the brass banisters were polished. I would recommend this hotel, and I'd stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Pool Party”
Reviews.Author: csantillo9
Reviews.Content: Loved the Saturday pool party. Food, music, and beer was great and FREE!!! Weather was great. Room were clean. Give it a try.

Reviews.Title: “Cleanest hotel I've ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: GDawgRN97
Reviews.Content: I went to Daytona Beach with friends from Germany to watch the space shuttle launch. We chose the Hampton Inn in Daytona Beach Shores because it is fairly close to the space center & from the positive reviews on Tripadvisor. We were more than pleased with our stay! The front desk staff are very friendly & helpful. The room we stayed in was oceanfront & very clean. The queen beds were comfortable with 4 pillows on each one and the linens smelled fresh & clean. The bathroom was sparkling with larger than normal towels that were soft & thick. The breakfast which was included with our room consisted of waffles, sausage, bacon, and an array of danishes & breads to choose from. They also provided bagged snacks at the front desk which had a piece of fruit, a granola bar, & bottled water & a tray of cookies in the evening. Beach towels were provided for the hot tub & pool. I can't say enough about how clean this hotel is. From the banisters, to the public restrooms, to the pool area, someone was consistantly picking up & polishing. I live within a couple of hours of Daytona & spend the weekend there several times a year. The Hampton Inn in Daytona Beach Shores will be the only place I'll be staying from now on. It's a bargain & a pleasure to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “An enjoyable experience - top to bottom.”
Reviews.Author: IndianaEmptynesters
Reviews.Content: Stayed here again since our last experience was so great (Sept. '09). We were not disappointed. This place is exactly what we are looking for - clean, effecient, peaceful. Everything worked just like it was supposed to - the shower, the bath fan, the air conditioner - everything. We are not used to this in Daytona! A great place to stay if you are looking for something that is not in the middle of the nightlife scene. We did have one little problem. The housekeeper took our used soap and towels and forgot to leave replacements one day. We went to the front desk on our way to dinner and told them, and they tripped all over themselves to give us everything we didn't get. (We think the housekeeper was new - tried hard but just forgot). Not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel okay location not so good”
Reviews.Author: happycatFlorida
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews for this hotel and it was rated # 2 for this area, The hotel was okay staff was nice but t.v. was terrible very blury and bed not too comfortable.Breakfast in the morning was just okay too been to many Hamptons and this wasn't quite the same as the others. The other drawback is no restaurant or lounge onsite and believe me there are not too many places around unless you want to drive a bit. The Italian place across the street was reccomended it was very old and outdated we just got pizza the cheese and sauce tasted okay the dough was terrible and the mushrooms were from a can not fresh. I do have to say the beach was nice and the pool area at hotel was nice too other than that I would probably stay elsewhere next time.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with beautiful oceanfront views”
Reviews.Author: gusmorgan
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with excellent service! I have stayed at many hotels and the service here is one of the best! The staff is kind and helpful with out being stuffy. They serve a great breakfast to get your day started The pool area was nice with ocean access right off the pool area. The rooms were clean and included a fridge and microwave to keep your beverages cold and to warm up snacks! The hotel was a great value and I hope to return again next year!

Reviews.Title: “LOVED THIS HOTEL!!!”
Reviews.Author: 4wheel2468
Reviews.Content: I have learned my lesson and will always stay at a Hampton Inn when I travel. This particular one was no exception! I had chosen another hotel in Daytona which I thought was giving me a better deal. When we got there, it was the worst shape hotel EVER! And, by the time they nickel and dimed me to death, it would have cost more than the Hampton, which ended up being very reasonably priced. We left the other hotel and immediately called the Hampton. We felt safe and secure there. (I was traveling with my mother and 3 young children). The pool is exceptional for a family and beach access was easy! As always, the free breakfast was yummy and a great money saver! They also helped accommodate me when the brakes went out on my car! Wonderful service! Clean hotel! Beautiful atmosphere! FUN! And a wonderful staff! Will never choose anything but a Hampton Inn EVER AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding!”
Reviews.Author: Chrisnbon
Reviews.Content: We had an outstanding stay at this hotel. We stayed on the top floor, ocean front. The room was just right and the price was great! especially for our budget. Breakfast was a delight. Each day there was something different unlike some hotels that just have the same old eggs. We had a different variety each day. Right on the beach and the pool was huge!. I did have to many of the complimentary homemade cookies at the front desk. The staff was very polite and helpful. I will always stay at this hotel when I visit the area in the future.

Reviews.Title: “"Great place"”
Reviews.Author: Live234
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the conference Stayed at the hotel for three nights. Everything clean and the hotel is great location by the beach I will return

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely # 1 place we have ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: Hellotrips
Reviews.Content: After traveling for more than 12 hours we made it to Daytona, Fl we normally stay at 2 other locations but due to weather we had not made any reservations and they we're booked. We walked into Hampton Inn and we're welcomed by 2 great ladies ( Sandy Ellis ) was one of them. Anyway, we we're welcomed like we just made it to mom's house. What more can I say. The experience was so great that we will never stay anywhere else. We found new friends that we will always keep in touch with. We also found several guest had been staying there for years they were won over as we were. Hooray to you all and thank you for making our visit so pleasureable and easy. your friends, Mackey NeSmith & Renee Dawson

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the Best”
Reviews.Author: Marie9Worcester
Reviews.Content: Our stay was fantastic. Everything was as expected and more. The staff always had a smile and ready to help. I will definitely stay here again. The location on the beach is a great spot ocean sounds to sleep by and sunrise every morning. Very well managed hotel. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “My Favorite Beach Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaJake69
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here three times. On this last trip my parents and sister/brother-in-law also came along with me and my wife. Everyone loved it. The staff is super friendly, and they recommended great restaurants. During the summer they have a cookout on Saturdays with free food, beer, and soft drinks. The oceanfront rooms provide a great view of the ocean and vehicles traveling on the beach. You can not beat this hotel for the price. The only drawback is that you have to drive a few miles to get to all the attractions from Daytona Shores. However, with the money you save by staying on the outskirts of Daytona Beach, it is worth driving a few miles.

Reviews.Title: “A credit to Hampton, Hilton and hotels in general!”
Reviews.Author: AncientHotellie
Reviews.Content: Incredibly caring, efficient and effective staff...among the best I've met (and I'm a Cornell Hotel School grad!) Clean, comfortable room, well maintained throughout, wonderful view, best breakfast options in the Hampton system. True value...especially when compared to those that think they offer competition! Balcony comfortably accomodates two chairs and a table. Hilton's accomodates only one, standing, svelt person.

Reviews.Title: “Right on the ocean”
Reviews.Author: maitlander
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for one night during a multi-day self-guided bicycle tour. The front desk staff were very helpful and had a perfect secure place to keep bicycles overnight. We stayed in an oceanfront room and it was beautiful to have the view of the beach and the sound of the waves. Good Italian restaurant across the street. It was up to Hampton Inn's high standards of cleanliness and breakfast selections.

Reviews.Title: “Good Basic Accommodation”
Reviews.Author: rsnd
Reviews.Content: We stayed here over a few days on the weekend and I would confirm much of what has been said before regarding the cleanliness, and the staff. I do however want to note that the staff is handing out flyers at the end of one's stay asking to be reviewed on this site. It is still a Hampton - even if a clean, well-maintained one, so it's a pretty basic accommodation. I guess from it's standing as the #1 rated hotel in the area, I thought it would really be spectacular but it wasn't the case. It's location means you are driving pretty much everywhere to get the decent restaurants and attractions. I think staying closer to the boardwalk (around the Hilton) you can at least get a decent cup of coffee at the Starbucks without having to drive somewhere. So if you're looking more on the budget end of the accommodations spectrum this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: MarciaMike
Reviews.Content: We just love being at this hotel. We stayed here for two weeks last year and enjoyed it so much that we came back for three weeks this year. As other people said, all the staff were the best. They are very friendly, very accomodating, and do treat everybody like family. We read the review that said they don't care about the guests and would sooner kick you out. I find that so very hard to believe based on our experiences. The hotel is right on the beach, which we love, and the pool is great. The hotel is very clean. The rooms are very quiet. They offer a great hot breakfast. There is such a variety of food at breakfast, that I would be surprised if someone couldn't find something they like. Five minutes before breakfast was to close, each table was individually informed that it would be closing in five minutes. We highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a great, friendly place right on the beach that is reasonably priced. We can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “Cean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: PalsJosh
Reviews.Content: This if the first time staying at this Hampton on the beach. We always stay at the Hampton Inns when we travel as we always know they will be clean. The manager at this Hampton was very friendly as we requested to see a couple of rooms for future visits in which she showed us around. On our trip we stayed at Amelia Island first, then Daytona Beach Shores and on our way home to N.C., we stayed at Sanee, S.C.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Getaway”
Reviews.Author: worldstop
Reviews.Content: This a perfect place to stay to get away for the weekend or the entire week.My family and I are frequent guests here and always look forward to staying at this hotel. Management and staff are very friendly and helpful. We are treated like we are part of their family, they make you fell comfortable right when you walk in the front door . Very clean rooms and the beds are like sleeping on a cloud. This is the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in, and I have stayed in alot of upscale hotels. The pool and oceanview is fantastic.I recommend this hotel especialty to families , very family oriented very secure nice location M Horne

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: NeedMoreTrips2
Reviews.Content: Just returned from vacation where we spent 2 days at the Hampton Inn Daytona Shores and our stay couldn't have been better! The staff was super friendly, the rooms were very spacious and clean and the location was perfect being right on the beach. There was a Saturday afternoon B-BQ poolside with all you could eat hamburgers, hotdogs, chips, soda and beer- all complimentary. What more could you ask for? They had karaoke and my 10 year old son had a blast belting out Johnny Cash with his mom. I even got up there and did one song, which normally isn't something I'd do. (Hopefully we didn't cause anyone to lose their B-BQ afterwards.) But it was a fun afternoon and I would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone. The hotel itself was great but the staff was the real difference maker. We spent the rest of our trip in Orlando and we were wishing that we could have taken the Hampton Inn Daytona Shores with us for the rest of our vacation. Don't know if we'll ever get back to Daytona but if we do, we will definitely being staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Not your typical Hampton Inn - Statisfaction Guaranteed or GET OUT”
Reviews.Author: locktownlady
Reviews.Content: Had the worst experience at this hotel. Managemnt unreasonable and downright disagreeable. Would not recommend to anyone. The Hilton Satisfaction Guarantee at this hotel means, "If you do not find this hotel to your satisfaction, get out or we will call the police and have you phically removed from the property". Avista Properties and Tristar Lodging, Inc., owners of this property, are the worst. They do not care about their customers and my family and I would not go back to this prope;rty on a bet!

Reviews.Title: “Identity theft concerns when they copied driver's license!”
Reviews.Author: choclabs
Reviews.Content: Agree with other reviewers as to rooms, beds, location, views, etc. The only problem we had was upon check-in. Since my husband is a Gold Card Member with all his info online and we booked ahead of arrival, check-in should have been simply handing us our key. Instead, they requested my husband's drivers license and AAA card and made copies of both, cut them out to size, and attached them to our file. Identity theft came to our minds! When we questioned why they did this, they said it was so those younger than 21 would not be discriminated against and file a lawsuit against them, and also it was a security issue. My husband, who is in late 50's, asked if he looked 21 and the desk clerk said no. This is the first Hampton Inn we've ever stayed in that required and made copies of your driver's license. We didn't mind showing them his license but to make a copy of it and keep it was outrageous! Upon departure at our insistance, they gave us back the copy of the drivers's license. From the tone of desk clerk's voice, I could tell we weren't the only ones who had complained. We called Hampton Inn and complained about this. Just be aware that they will copy your driver's license. The night before, at 11:00 PM , my allergies started acting up so I went downstairs to purchase some Benedril--no shop! Most Hampton's at least have a small shop that carries drinks, water, candy, chips, small packages of medicine, etc. Another note, at exactly 10:00 AM (9:59 AM by my watch), the breakfast staff abruptly took everything away even though there were still folks eating. I would recommend this hotel but only if you don't have an issue with them copying your drivers license.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: JPMSavannah
Reviews.Content: Great location very large rooms with balcony, oceanfront The room was clean and smelling fresh when we checked in Good beds great place to stay, just a few yards fronm the beach However, Internet did not work

Reviews.Title: “A cruise ship atmosphere on shore!”
Reviews.Author: gnowak197
Reviews.Content: A wonderful stay! The staff is wonderful! I have stayed many nights in different hotels throughout the country and NEVER have I run into the General Manager of that property (unless there was a complaint). Sandy, the General Manager of this property was not only available, but out and about with the guests ensuring they were taken care of! She truly made every guest feel special! The karaoke/DJ event they host on Saturday afternoons in the summer months is a phenominal time! I recommend a stay at this property for anyone who enjoys the beach and having a fun relaxing time!

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel and Staff on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: innerspace
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at this hotel, and what a place it was, from the room to the staff, everything was outstanding. Upon check-in found that we had another discount to be added in, and on Sat there was to be a 'pool party' for all guests, There was music, BBQ nad drink provided, what a fantastic time, even though my partner got 'addicted' to the punch, to funny what a great time, and will go back soon, best place on the beach. Thanks to all there for such a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Grea place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: vetteguyJax_FL
Reviews.Content: My wife & I have stayed at this property several times over the years & always had a pleasant stay. Now they've done something to make it even better. Every Saturday throughout the summer, the General Manager Sandy & her husband Mike put on a cookout on the pool deck. Hot dogs, hamburgers & beverages free of charge as their way of thanking their guests. We had a great time & I know everyone else there did as well. Also had a DJ pool side all afternoon. What a way to spend a relaxing weekend. The rooms are always clean & comfortable as well. We plan on going back in a couple of weeks to do it over again. Looking forward to it.

Reviews.Title: “Sandy Ellis and her team do a fantastic job!!”
Reviews.Author: Sanders-Mississauga
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Daytona Shores - Oceanfront for 6 nights and had a fantastic time. We were lucky enough to be at the hotel for two of the wonderful cookouts that are hosted by the hotel complete with food, drinks and music. The hotel is kept in excellent shape and is very well maintained. As per other Hampton Inns the breakfast is included with your stay and offers great variety over our extended stay. The pool is cleaned every day by a professional poolkeeper! Oh ya the warm cookies in the evenings made you feel like you were at home away from home. Thanks to Sandy and her staff for a wonderful vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Don't miss this hotel in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: virginia_traveler78
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Hampton Inn Daytona Beach Shores-Oceanfront for vacation. Having stayed at other properties in the area on past visits including the "old" Hilton, I can say that this is the best property that I have stayed in on the Daytona Beach oceanfront. The staff are friendly and very helpful and the rooms clean. Many of the visitors appeared to be repeat customers which speak to the staff, price, and upkeep of the hotel. Any complaints appeared to be taken care of promptly. As mentioned in other reviews, the pool is a little on the small side but seemed to be adequate for the number of guests that used it. This hotel is on the quieter end of the beach and the guests, I believe, are limited to above the age of 18 unless accompanied by an adult. This seemed to limit the night time noise at the hotel. That being said, the staff go out of their way to make your stay a "fun" experience. The free breakfast is standard Hampton Inn food. One "extra" I'm not used to at other Hampton Inn properties is the delivery of the weekend local paper for Hilton Honors members; this is a nice touch. I would return to the hotel when in the area again.

Reviews.Title: “Family-oriented hotel and super friendly staff. They added to the fun of the trip.”
Reviews.Author: gator1006
Reviews.Content: This hotel is clean and the staff is super friendly. From the greeting from the front desk staff when you walk in to get your room, they never stop smiling or checking to see if you are having a pleasant stay. The manager is highly visible and outgoing. She stops to chat with guests, checks with her staff throughout the day and I feel she is the large part of the reason it is a family-oriented hotel. The staff acts like a big extended family. Just a pleasant environment. The Saturday cookouts (all you can eat burgers and dogs, chips and drinks) along with the karoke provide for a thoroughly entertaining Saturday. Even though it's beachfront, the party on the deck makes you want to stay up on the deck so that you don't miss out on anything (the singing, in particular). Many times you will also see the staff participating in the karoke.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return”
Reviews.Author: Feel_All_Right
Reviews.Content: Very nice location. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean. On Saturdays, they have a pool party with food, singing and games. I would definitely return to this location the next time I am in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome facility in quiet area of Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: bonlewis
Reviews.Content: Very nice facility right on the beach. Large pool area & lunch provided on Saturday. Room was nice, like all Hamptons. Breakfast provided was standard fare for Hampton properties, very good. Staff was very helpful & super nice. Extras: pool towels & beach chairs available for guest use at no charge. Parking is a bit of challenge when the hotel is at max capacity, but overflow parking across the street was really not that big of a deal. Microwave & large fridge was great. Publix & Winn Dixie very close. Weather was great, beach was awesome - hated to have to leave.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely family friendly”
Reviews.Author: AGAgirl
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the perfect place for a family reunion with many amenities for all ages. The entertainment and cookout by the pool on Saturday was a welcomed treat for the adults while the kids enjoyed the pool toys and large spacious swimming area. The breakfasts were ample and offered a variety to meet everyone's preferences. I would highly recommend this hotel to other families.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to spend a few days with the fam!”
Reviews.Author: sciteach07
Reviews.Content: Totally clean, room was nice, and had a great view of both the ocean and the drive-in church. Free lunch and drinks on Saturday was an AWESOME surprise, and of course Hampton Inn's continental breakfasts are way above average. Easy to walk to restaurants, etc. Highly recommended! Oh, and I almost forgot the fresh-baked cookies every night!

Reviews.Title: “sandy does a great job with the hampton inn”
Reviews.Author: peteshd
Reviews.Content: the only thing is the parking .small parking lot. but they do have across the street.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hotel and Staff on the Beach!!”
Reviews.Author: wdwlovers
Reviews.Content: We stayed the weekend at this hotel and wish that we could have stayed longer. We really enjoyed the grill out. Sandy and her staff are awesome!!

Reviews.Title: “Best all around vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Patricia777
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn Dayton Shores-Oceanfront has become a vacation destination. Our family has stayed with Sandy and her team repeatedly over the years. Consistently, the staff is friendly. Most striking to me was the level of cleanliness that is maintained. All of the public/common areas are given scrupulous attention--the lobby restrooms, brass handrails, tile floors, breakfast/dining area, elevators, pool and hot tub are all carefully maintained. That's no small feat for an oceanfront facility! The atmosphere is family friendly, fun and relaxing. The Shores is a beautiful place to visit and Hampton Inn is conveniently located to restaurants, putt-putt golf, ice cream parlors, movie theaters and historic Ponce Inlet Lighthouse. Views vary from gorgeous eastern sunrises to sunsets over the river. And btw, for your teens...bring your laptop...there's internet so they'll be able to network with their friends back home. lol.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Nelly1234Wisconsin
Reviews.Content: Great place to go. Management is helpful and personable. Great trip

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing vacation.”
Reviews.Author: jab86So_Illinois
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, along with the 3 teens, enjoyed a lovely 4 night stay. Two beachfront queens with a private balcony and a comfortable rollaway were very accommodating. The beach is seconds away and the pool is complete with floats and and donated beach chairs. The entire staff was extremely friendly and was constantly busy cleaning and making the guests feel at home. We regret we didn't get to stay for the BBQ, but will next time as we would certainly come back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and free lunch on Saturday!”
Reviews.Author: autismmom1
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our way back home from a week at Disney and it was a welcome respite. We stayed in a room with a king bed and our son slept on the rollaway. The room was large and clean, the air worked perfectly and housekeeping was quick and efficient. There was also a fridge and microwave. The best surprise is that the hotel provides free hamburgers, hot dogs, chips, drinks and beer on Saturday for guests staying there. You must wear the armbands to participate, and the food was good! They had karaoke set up by the pool and some contests for the kids. They also had pool toys for the kids to use. There is a Red Lobster within walking distance, which is where we ate that evening. Really enjoyed our time at this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel- not enough parking”
Reviews.Author: gvillefl
Reviews.Content: We stayed Friday thru Monday. Saturday they had a cookout and DJ by the pool which was very fun! The worst part was arriving back to the hotel Saturday night after dinner and not having a parking space. Even the over flow lot was full! People were parking in between the handicapped spots which left those in wheel chairs or with walkers no room to get into their vehical. This was pretty upsetting to have to park in an unlit and unsecure parking lot away from the hotel where I had to worry about being towed or worse. May return, but not on a busy weekend day!

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn at its best!!”
Reviews.Author: buckeyes46
Reviews.Content: We are so glad to have discovered this "oasis" on the beach ! Beautifully decorated, clean rooms with a microwave and refrigerator and great priced oceanfront rooms where you can sit back on your larger than normal balcony and watch the action on the beach ! The pool was very clean, larger than most Hampton Inns with lots of chairs and the perfect temperature. Easy access to the beach - just a ten second walk. We were lucky enough to arrive in time for their Saturday afternoon BBQ (which they provide FREE every Saturday afternoon weather permitting from Memorial Day to Labor Day!) What a nice treat! Hamburgers, hot dogs, drinks, beer (even rum punch the day we were there!), chips and an afternoon of DJs and karaoke ! What more could you want! Sandy, the manager, is THE BEST! You will feel like family by the time you leave! Course we didn't want to leave! The free breakfast changes their hot item every day so that is a refreshing change from other hotels. The food was fresh and tasty and most of all, there was always plenty of it even on their busiest mornings. Oh yeah, I can't forget the warm cookies every night at the front desk and the friendliest staff in town ! We found lots of good restaurants near by for lunch/dinner ! I won't stay anywhere else and I will definitely be back !

Reviews.Title: “ask for indoor corridor room”
Reviews.Author: fussy2U
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, I found out that our oceanfront room was in a part of the hotel that you had to access from an outside corridor and there were a large number of dead bugs outside the entrance to our room. I tried to change our room location to an inside oceanfront room, but there were only a limited number inside rooms and they were booked. We didn't see any bugs inside the room, so, we thought we would be OK. However, when we returned to the room in the evening, we were accosted by the flying version trying to enter our room. In hindsight, I think I would have been much happier with an oceanview room above the third floor, since they are inside. It's on a nice stretch of beach and the rooms are clean. Thank goodness for the beach because the pool needed some attention. The breakfast area was larger than most Hamptons I've been to and it overlooks the pool/beach. On-site parking is cramped and limited, but, there is an overflow lot across the street.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: SC-Popman
Reviews.Content: Wonderful Hotel!!! The staff was extremely friendly. The hotel was clean, as was the pool and hot tub. We were there for the weekend. When we arrived we were surprised with a poolside cookout. Even though it was stormy, the staff grilled hamburgers and hotdogs with all the fixings for all hotel guests. Another surprise was cookies every night at 7:30. One reason we book at Hampton is their free continental breakfast, which was good. Our room had a refrigerator, which was very convenient for water and sodas. Access to the beach was excellent. The hotel even offered beach chairs on a first come basis. We will definitely stay here on future trips to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Staff, and Location”
Reviews.Author: Butlerinivest
Reviews.Content: I stay at Hampton Inn hotels frequently for business and this hotel is one of the best! I had the best vacation time at this hotel i have had in a while. The location, accomodation, and service are among the best. I will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Best Manager, best staff, best location results in a great vacation”
Reviews.Author: vette3
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel by accident a few years ago because Airport Hampton Inn was full. A stroke of luck because we have returned every year since. Enjoy being on the ocean and we are treated like family. The manager and staff do everything possible to make our stay very enjoyable. Sandy Ellis, the manager, goes to great lengths to make us feel welcome. Have never stayed in a hotel that had a manager like Sandy Ellis. The people that work at the front desk are friendly and always helpful and the cleaning staff do a great job of keeping a nice hotel clean and attractive. Don and Barb Anderson Rockford, IL

Reviews.Title: “highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: shlly
Reviews.Content: great location; paradise with an ocean view. staff was very professional and courteous. every possible attention to detail to ensure your stay was pleasurable. will return every year to this great family get away.

Reviews.Title: “Free Internet...Try NO INTERNET...”
Reviews.Author: zeke1960
Reviews.Content: The rooms were not worth the outrageous rates. The free internet never worked. The breakfast was horrible. The young man who checked me in was rude and was more concerned with watching the television than helping me and my family find a room that fit our needs. I will never stay there again. For the price I paid, I feel I was owed a little more respect.

Reviews.Title: “If you need something just ask Kyle or anyone at Hampton guarantee you got it !!!”
Reviews.Author: ccrnapier
Reviews.Content: I can't imagine anyone getting better service and all while smiling,and that makes a big difference ! The rooms were very nice and clean. The beds were great. The mattres was nice,thick and firm and not sagging in the middle. Refrigerator and microwave were nice. Bathroom was really nice and roomy. Every morning you got a different breakfast ( FREE ) and good !! At 7:30 every evening they have the best warm cookies! The pool area kept nice. Inside,everywhere you look someone was always cleaning and shining something and always friendly and smiling. I just wished that they had a cocktail lounge or a little bar outside so that we could have a frozen drink or cocktail in the afternnon or a hotdog. We fly in to daytona to relax and tan so running around in a car is not a vaction to us. we run around in a car a traffic enough at home.

Reviews.Title: “Second Home”
Reviews.Author: CT61
Reviews.Content: Going back next month.We are regulars at this hotel. I cannot imagine that there is better value to be had in the entire area.All the staff are fantastic,it is spotlessly clean,the rooms are a good size and the pool and beach are a few steps away.Plenty of good restaurants in the area. My wife enjoys the local stores.I could go on and on about the little touches that sets this hotel apart. I should add that I spend 25 to 30 nights a year at other hotels. None of these would receive 5 stars in all 5 categories as this hotel does.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: jlcOhio
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to this Hampton Inn and it did not disappoint. Our 18 month old son loved the pool. The oceanfront location was also perfect for a toddler. The breakfast each morning was delicious.

Reviews.Title: “It's the best of the best”
Reviews.Author: aultrn
Reviews.Content: An oceanfront room is the way to go! If you want to stay on the ocean, stay here. The view is awesome. The entire staff is friendly, courteous, accommodating, helpful and make you feel like "family". This hotel is constantly cleaning, fixing and updating inside and outside of the hotel.
